name: Card Brawl: Dungeon Slayer
description:
Magical spires have risen across the land causing discord and chaos... No longer a mere shopkeeper, the fate of Aragonia now lies in your hands...
Choose your path in procedurally generated dungeons and employ unique strategies with each playthrough! Slay your way to the Elite Boss at the end of each dungeon to unlock new cards for your collection and carve your name in history as the top ranked card brawler across Aragonia! Immerse yourself in a turn-based Roguelike CCG like no other, where you must randomly draft cards as you progress through each spire, testing the limits of your wit and skill with each battle.
Collect powerful cards to create epic combos, wield masterful strategies by unlocking mighty heroes and their unique skills, gear up heroes with legendary equipment and turn the tides of battle across PvE and PvP by unleashing a well-timed spell! In Card Brawl you draft cards as you progress making each level more interesting than the last!
What are you waiting for? Install Card Brawl for FREE to experience the mayhem of roguelike card battles and join the millions of players around the world in the Arena to forge your legacy!

name: Quick Rally
description:
Quick Rally.
An arcade casual fastest time chaser.
Compete on the leaderboard against friends or anyone in the world to set the fastest time on each track.
A weekly challenge track, with a new track each week and a fresh clean leaderboard to compete for the best time.

name: Boundary Walls
description: Overview: You are a source of light trapped inside walls and you need to escape from these walls surrounded by various traps, but how? The light sources you find around open a gateway for you to move on to the next level, and you can only get out of here by collecting them.

name: Pottery
description: Pottery is a VR simulator that makes everyone feel like a real potter. The simulator reproduces the main stages of the production of pottery: the selection and preparation of clay, the creation of a workpiece blank, the processes of drying, painting, firing and glazing the product.

name: This This Rice
description:
Simulator game made in Hong Kong.
Pack the lunch box.
Take the money.

name: Colors: Zero
description: Colors:Zero is an interactive storytelling set in a neo noir universe. You will play as a detective and will be assigned to investigate about strange murders.

name: Grabe 4x4
description: Grabe 4x4 is a beat 'em up game where players must fight in the Philippines and outsmart their enemies by selecting the correct two attacks out of the four available buttons on the controller.

name: Bunny Hop Hare Trigger
description: Hone your movement skills and strive for the fastest times in this speedrunning/parkour platformer!

name: Pocket Vikings
description: Sin descripción

name: Doomsday Fodder
description: Get yourself a Hero Squad and survive huge waves of enemies, trying to break the game with mindful choices. DOOMSDAY FODDER combines rogue-lite, autochess, bullet-hell and survival elements in a unique blend of action and strategy.

name: Sandbox War Dispatch
description: An rts 1v1 battle game, the background is the sandbox simulation of modern military warfare. You can command the coordinated operations of sea, land, air and space, play tactics freely, and experience military art, to fight until the enemy's capital is destroyed to win;

name: K.O. Drive
description: Back in 2012, Sega unveiled a new combat driving arcade game called KO Drive at the DEAL 2012 trade show in Dubai. Afterwards, the game made an occasional appearance at other trade shows, but ultimately was cancelled. This easy to pick up battle-racing game has been designed with multiplayer action in mind. Tracks include London, Vegas, Shanghai, Toronto, Cairo and Rome.

name: Dante's Quest
description: Darkness has fallen on princess Emilia’s castle. The evil king has sealed away all life and locked everyone in the castle walls. In her moment of need, Emilia calls to Dante, her loyal knight, to save the castle and defeat the king! Do you have what it takes to defeat the darkness and save Emilia’s castle?

name: Soccer Match
description: Test your reaction and agility in this exciting soccer themed swap and matching game, featuring three different and addictive modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous soccer packed levels as you try your hardest to be top of the league.

name: Black Eye
description:
Play puzzle game to earn points and collect "Eyes" for the game "Capture The Flag".
Play multiplayer stratygy game "Capture The Flag" to beat your friends or other people playing this game and conquer more "Eyes".
Both games have animated Tutorials.
More Games:

name: Pocket Claw
description:
A cute claw machine in your pocket!
Introducing the free claw machine, Pocket Claw from Magic Cube!
The characters of the popular games of Magic Cube are appeared as a toy in the Claw Machines.

name: Super Quest
description: You can go on an adventure with just one finger in your spare time. Explore dungeons to slay monsters, level up, go to towns & buy equipments, then defeat boss!!

name: Hidden Object: Adventures Duke of Richelieu
description:
A new story in the style of Hidden Object. In 1734, the Duke of Richelieu tries to seize the throne of the King of France. The Musketeers of the King of France Louis do not allow to capture the throne of King Louis. Help the Musketeers of the King of France Louis is not true of the plans of the Duke of Richelieu
Enter lush paintings and meet fantastic characters in mysterious world. Original music score composed specifically for each area of the adventure.

name: Pixelogic
description:
Pixelogic is a fun and challenging puzzle game where you use logic to reveal a hidden picture made of colored cells. Like a mixture between sudoku and minesweeper, numeric hints are used to uncover a pixelated surprise.
Pixelogic is based on a japanese logic game commonly referred to as Picross, Nonograms, Griddlers, Pic-a-Pix, Hanjie and Paint by Numbers.

name: Pixa
description: Do you love classic video games from the 8-bit era? Do names like "Pitfall," "Combat," "Adventure," or "Haunted House" bring back warm memories of fuzzy televisions and pixelated landscapes? Pixa offers all the nostalgia of an 8-bit classic with all the polish and depth of a modern hit. It will take you on a smile-inducing quest in true old-school style. Simple. Classic. Engrossing. Try it now!

name: Dragon Scroll
description: A true warrior is the one who is capable to understand the quests of life in every situation. Find the warrior within yourself. Inspired from pool, Dragon Scroll gives you a striker marble and your aim is to collect all the target marbles on the screen. There will be obstacles, some you must avoid and some you may use.

name: BattleSquared
description:
BattleSquared is a fun turn-based pass and play game that relies heavily on both strategy and luck. Your objective is to eliminate the entirety of your opponents forces by finding items throughout the map and utilizing them against your opponent while simultaneously avoiding environmental roadblocks.
Dodge strafing runs, mortar shells, and enemy gunfire all while trying to hunt down weapons and armor to defeat your opponent!

name: Fly!!!
description:
Do you like flying in the blue sky? If you like flying feeling, play with the Ostrich and learn to fly with him.
Fly to earn money, buy rockets and glider wings to fly further.

name: Forest of Frequencies
description:
Step into a world where music, magic and nature collide.

Forest of Frequencies is a single player music adventure strategy game where you can explore a world filled with dangerous creatures, breath taking flora and spirits looking for their bodies. Music, visual art & gameplay comes together to form a unique experience made for those who love the interplay and combination of art forms.

name: Ridge Runner
description: Ridge Runner is a game of reaction and skill as you try to escape the castle. Collect stars to unlock different characters including a knight on horseback, a fireman or even a selfie-obsessed teenage girl. Game features high quality 2D visuals, retro inspired custom soundtrack and a variety of fun characters to unlock.

name: Maze Forever
description: Maze Forever gives you the benefit of countless hours of fun while polishing your puzzle solving skills. A beautiful minimalistic design helps you focus on the gameplay while enjoying each well crafted puzzle level. Golden coins are sprinkled in random locations and you’ll need to collect them to unlock special characters and maze themes. The ultimate goal is to access the worldwide leaderboards and show off to the world how good your puzzle solving skills are. Think you are smart enough to do it? There’s only one way to find out, install Maze Forever!

name: Hidden Object: Hunter Secrets of Aztec and Mayan Tribes
description:
Hidden Object: Hunters Secrets Of Aztec and Mayan Tribes
The game has 50 levels in which you need to show the ability of mindfulness, agility, fast thinking, and precision of your actions.

name: Cake5
description: Cake5 team members need your help! CC, GBM, Taro, Brownie, and Rainbow - have been sent on a mission far from home by the Sweet Queen and Dr. Puff to find the lost sweet taste that's gone missing from the Sweet Planet. Help the Cake5 team explore the Universe and visit magic ovens on distant worlds, asking them for clues and fragments of the magic recipe stolen from Sweet Planet by the Crystal Fox. Help Cakes complete their mission and find the sweet taste.

name: Spinny Path
description:
Race the Spinny Path and reach the finish line!
Get addicted to this fast paced racing game!
Excellent graphics and an endless supply of levels will keep you hooked
Get the frenzy star and smash your way to the goal!

name: M.U.D. Rally
description: If you are looking for real mobile rally simulation, than you are in the right place. Race at 60 fps in mud, snow, dirt and asphalt in this fast-paced racing game.

name: Sports Car Challenge 2
description: High-end racing on mobile enters the next round with Sports Car Challenge 2. Drive a total of 20 exclusive super cars by international top-brands such as Audi, Bentley, Bugatti, Lamborghini, Porsche and Volkswagen. Enjoy photo-realistic 3D graphics and spectacular attention to detail. Show your skills on the asphalt in three ambitious game modes and make your way to the top of the global leader boards. Fill your trophy room with the rewards from dozens of challenging achievements!

name: DuoXBall
description: DuoXBall is a fun foosball game for 1 or 2 players. There is a selection of 11 tables with range of themes. Play on the same phone against your friend or challenge the computer.

name: Super DJ
description:
In Super DJ, players get to become the DJ of an epic 3D party. It’s up to you to keep the music going by guiding the flying record through a trippy obstacle course filled with neon rings, blocks, and tunnels. Hovering over different colored blocks changes the tempo of the music, allowing you to create your own remix. Each block has a distinct sound so you can get really creative with each track.

As you rock the crowd, you earn points that you can later use to unlock new music tracks like techno, hip hop, electro, and reggae. In this 3D game, the party never ends! Plus, just like a real DJ, you can make scratch sound effects by swiping your finger back and forth quickly.

name: Bounce Time!
description:
Demolish as many bricks as you can by bouncing the ball before the blocks reach the bottom. The blocks are numbered according to how many hits it takes to demolish them, the number of hits goes up as the game progresses. Collect the white objects to get more balls and the yellow coins to unlock the other characters with various superpowers, also, the coins can enable you to have another chance even when the game is ‘over’.
Get Ready, Aim, Fire, Have fun!

name: Battle Tap Tap
description:
This is a tapping battlefield. You get 1 minute to tap as many times as possible
It is simple but challenging. Can you be the final winner?

name: PowerSkate
description:
Bored with those plain small games? Loving challenges? Why not try PowerSkate!
Extremely cool action, gorgeous special effects, plentiful levels but accessible control. Come and Conquer!

name: Rugby Hero
description: Kickoff the Rugby World Cup 2015 with infinite ‘TRY’ scoring fun and win Glory with your favorite team. Be the famous player of your heroic team and have fun running past defenders this Rugby season. Show off your skills by running hard to fend off endless tackles and Score the highest to celebrate victories.

name: Bubble Wrap Frenzy
description: OK, ready for the most addicting, mind-blowing, fun action packed game for you and your family? Look no further, this game app will have you going in a Bubble Wrap Frenzy !!! Easy instructions on how the game works. Simply try to pop all the bubbles before time runs out but be careful not to pop the wrong ones. Now before you get started, loosen up those fingers because they are about to get one heck of a workout! Now the true question is, can you finish all levels of the game? Many have attempted, few have accomplished. Lets see if you are ready to take the ultimate challenge.

name: Rainbow Slide
description: Slide your way up the rainbow, jumping from level to level through the colored gates. Time your jump and watch out for the spikes! How far can you get?

name: Ninja Runner
description:
You think you are the best ninja in history?
well, You have to prove it!
It’s time for a test and show everyone what you're capable of! You’ll have to fly over between building rooftops. Well, Let's test out how much you can handle the speed.
Press and hold for longer jump!

name: SwayBods
description: Bubble monsters are sad and get delighted when they are swaying. Tap them to get them swaying! ... but then they dislike bumping into each other.

name: Bounce Lounge
description: Experience sensual immersion in this audio-visual trip of hand-crafted stages, each ft. an original soundtrack with colorful animations. Test your skills & reflexes in endless, an infinite mix of color and obstacles that is unique every play.

name: Hilltop Hotrods
description: Meet Undead Ed, Doc Ocular and their friends in this easy to learn, but difficult to master racing game.

name: Satan's Zombies
description:
In Satans Zombies you are one of the last remaining survivors in the Zombie Apocalypse, and you're a badass bikie tearing through the highway of a megapolis shooting zombies and kicking rival bikers.
The game is similar to other endless runners but is more violent, contains a lot of blood, guns and action movie cameras.

name: Racers Islands
description: Compete against some crazy drivers

name: Stickman Downhill Monstertruck
description: Stickman Downhill Monstertruck is the third edition of the Stickman Downhill series. Experience ultra realistic and fast paced action packed Monster Truck racing in stunning environments. Choose from more than 15 different trucks, including very special ones like a school bus, shopping cart, crane, a kerosene powered rocket turbine truck and even a mini RC Monster Truck. Race in various different locations, ranging from tracks in deep forest to mountain tracks high up in the air. Every truck is designed by hand with its own physics, handling and realistic sounds.

name: Lane Splitter
description: Ride your motorcycle at insane speeds through ever changing traffic. Your reflexes will mean the difference between surviving or crashing in spectacular fashion.

name: Sugar High
description: Meet Biscuit, a dog with a huge sweat tooth. Every time he falls asleep, he dreams about worlds full of candies to eat. Run with Biscuit through sugar-filled levels, avoid obstacles, collect power-ups and eat all kinds of sweets.

name: Docking Donuts2 in 1
description:
You should sell the donuts ordered.
You'll be supplied with donuts one by one.
Then you just lay it in the tray.
Of course, you should not lay it carelessly.
To sell and get money,
Just put three or more donuts together then the donuts will be sold(removed).
As time goes on, the screen will be filled with the donuts from the bottom.
Sell the donuts ordered before it is overflowing.

name: Hidden Object: Underground Treasures Gold
description:
An adventure lover dreams the same dream every night, of a huge cave shining with numerous treasures.
After waking up, she finds that her younger brother has run away.
While looking for her brother she finds a hiding place with an old tree.
So begin her incredible adventure in search of treasures hidden deep underground.

name: Eggсellence: Eggs Bounce
description:
Don't just be good - be egg-cellent! Catch the eggs falling from many directions in a chicken coop. How long can you go on without cracking an egg? Challenge your friends and show them who is the real egg savior!
Eggсellence is a 2D family arcade game about farming. Meet Russ Eggsavior, a nice hard-working guy who is doing his best to keep his little chicken farm in order. Help Russ at the farm, and don't drop the eggs!

name: DizzyRoids
description:
Are you up to the challenge? How long can you play before you are completely dizzy?
A totally new twist on a retro classic, DizzyRoids takes the old school fun of shooting asteroids and flips it on its head.

name: On the Wind
description:
Take control of the wind and guide the leaves through a beautiful and stylish world. Try to survive through the year as the seasons change and the leaves fall.
You are the wind, guide the leaves, flourish in the summer, survive the winter.

name: SilhouetteGirl Zan
description:
Silhouette girl series fourth bullet
The latest work "Silhouette Girl Cutter" finally released!
The stage is "Japan" -
Growing up in a world devastated by mystery
I do not remember the faces of my parents
The girl who spent with the sword "Kurosu"

name: Hidden Objects: Messy Kitchen
description: Hidden Object – Messy Kitchen – the ultimate puzzle solving adventure and a cool mystery game for kids and adults! Can you clean up the messy kitchen and find all the mysterious objects in the pictures?

name: PunPics
description:
PunPics is a guess-the-picture game with a twist–it’s all puns. Use that squishy brain of yours to solve a growing collection of visual pun puzzles and riddles.
Test your wits against our punny mind benders, brain teasers, and visual rebus puzzles.

name: Clash of Elements
description:
Clash of Elements is something more than a typical puzzle game! It combines best features from puzzle games and multiplayer world.
The Element is in you! Just pick fire, wind, water, stone, earth or thunder. Name your character and start fighting with your friends, random players or bosses.
The fight starts with laying stones - powerful pieces of elements that you need to destroy to get either attack or defence points. As usual you can create combinations or special pieces. If you are really smart and quick you can destroy your opponent with just a few swipes hitting him with great balls of fire, tsunami waves or giant stones.
Are you ready to fight?

name: Rainmaker: Ultimate Trading Game
description:
Fun and exciting way to experience stock trading with best companies on stock markets around the world. Become rich! Make millions and billions on high stake trades! Compete and compare your strategy against your friends.
Rainmaker offers fast paced trading experience in a nutshell. In just 30 seconds, you’ll experience 2 years of ups and downs in stock price changes.

name: Mesa
description: Welcome to Mesa: a completely original game of strategy and friendly domination. Carefully select tiles to fuse powers and decimate your opponent in head-to-head gameplay.

name: Amoeboid
description: Lead Phoebe the Amoeba through a microscopic world full of food, friends, and foes. Eat food particles, collect strands of DNA, and meet other microbial pals all while avoiding infection from the nasty viruses. If you get infected 3 times it's game over! Restore your health by finding "Happy Pills" then go "Radioactive" as the viruses attack in waves! How many levels will you make it through?

name: Irbot
description: iRBot is a highly addictive and playable 3D side scrolling platform game. Featuring super cool graphics and game play as you try and lead iRBot through the space station complex to freedom.

name: Moyashibito DX
description: Since its release, it has been much talked about around the world and in the manufacturer community!

name: Hunger Crunch
description: Sin descripción

name: Mad Finger Marathon
description: Run with you fingers as fast as you can to try and get to the top of the leader board.

name: Simon's Cat in Purrfect Pitch
description:
Simon's Cat has arrived in his very own app! Now you can have Simon's Cat performing for you in the palm of your hand!
Purrfect Pitch is a creative musical app and a game too! The creative mode allows you to compose your own tunes, save them, and then watch as Simon's Cat sings them back! The game mode sees you taking on Simon's Cat, as he tests your ability to follow his lead in a series of increasingly difficult musical challenges!
Sure to raise a smile, this app is a must for any Simon's Cat fan!

name: Galaxy Hero H2H
description:
This retro space shooter lets you battle head to head to find out who is the greatest Galaxy Hero!
Challenge people around the world with Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing!

name: Cardboard Football Club
description: Cardboard Football Club Premium is a highly addictive skill-based soccer game. Combining outstanding gameplay, colorful graphics, great audio effects and local multiplayer.

name: Beast Farmer
description: Beast Farmer is a living, breathing, experience which will transport you to the mythical lands of Beast Planet.

name: Night Bars
description:
Match the falling bars from the top with the bars at the bottom as they keep falling in various speeds and numbers.
Test your tap-eye coordination and leave your mark in the game leader-boards

name: Badaboom
description:
Badaboom is a rhythm game that brings the player to a pre-historic world of Dinos and Cavemen, where you must play the drums in the right time to command Obo (our hero) to fight and conquer his food, his weapons and, above all, his right to live in peace.
The game has 2D platform style, with simple controls that allows to command Obo through the combination of drum's sounds. Combining 4 sounds like "Ba Boom Da Bing" Obo starts to get aggressive and attacks it's enemies with a spear.
With upgradable weapons and calling the help of Natural Elements, Obo can use many strategies to beat a level and to do it in the less time possible, going on to other scenarios and facing bigger challenges.

name: Capitals Battle
description: Capitals is a free and addictive social word game. Play against your friends to spell the best words and expand your territory. Use strategy to defend your capital and knock out your opponent’s!

name: Letter Wizard Arcade
description:
Arcade version has a limit of 50 words meaning when you find 50 words the game is over. Score as many points as possible with only a 50 word limit.
Try the full version Letter Wizard (on the App Store) to play with unlimited words.
Connect letters to make words. Use bonus tiles to increase the word score. When red tiles reach the bottom the game is over.

name: Amber Route
description:
Amber Route is a trip to the land of the Slavic beliefs, monsters and magic. Might and magic, heroes, destiny, order and chaos, duels, fate, monsters and adventure. In this game full of surprises embark on a dangerous journey leading his caravan through more and more new areas. The path which you will defeat is however treacherous. At each step, they will persecute traps, sinister creatures and ancient magic. To win, plan your moves carefully, protect ambers, gain extra bodyguards and try to reach as soon as possible to your destination.
Amber Route turn-based game will satisfy even the most demanding fans of board games. The game offers four types of gameplay. So we try our hand at Campaign mode, where we are waiting for as many as 20 boards, play one of the special missions in Single or stand face to face with the enemy using the options Duel (playing on one device) or Multiplayer. The game also offers three difficulty levels, and more than a hundred unique cards.

name: iZumas
description:
Are you a match 3 fun? Are you a nostalgic person?
If you are, this game will bring you back to the classic fun!

name: Shopping Cart Defense
description: Shopping Cart Hero invades the defense genre! Fight off waves of groupies through epic battles of bananas, pitchforks, and the occasional UFO. Work your way through the farmlands and the snowy mountains to see if you can triumph over what lurks in the mysterious jungles. You probably can't. Don't bother trying.

name: Dunker.io
description: Start dunking in an insane multiplayer .io basketball court, yup!

name: Blocky Warriors: Amazing Race
description: Welcome to Blocky Warriors! This is a real-time running game with characters of Blocky style. Try to outrun 3 other players in real-time battle and become the best player in the world! If someone blocks your way, just use your skills to smash the enemy!

name: Bike Trials Junkyard 2
description: Since you like the first one we are now giving you the second part of the game, Bike Trials Junkyard 2! With 20 new challenging stages, drive and balance your bike in the rough terrain of the junkyard. It's never going to be a smooth ride in this game. So better put on your helmet because it's going to be a bumpy ride...

name: Daytona Rush
description: The official Daytona game now on mobile!

name: Base Under Attack!
description: Can you save your base and protect your planet from hordes of alien ships, commander? Arm your base with advanced arsenal of turrets and unique upgrades in this highly addictive action packed defense game.

name: Space Surf: Shark Attack
description:
You are Tyrone Stallion, a world famous surfer riding some of the gnarliest waves ever surfed! But there’s trouble in the water. A 10 foot great white shark named Brutus is after you! Surf waves, whales, dolphins, birds, airplanes and UFO’s to stay ahead of Brutus the shark!

Surf past as many islands as you can and discover all the incredible things you can interact with in this exciting, action packed surfing endless runner!

name: Gravity Line
description:
GravityLine is the code name for a super-secret operation, whose aim is to save the world. In a top-secret lab, brilliant scientists (aka players) are working hard to destroy the HEB - huge and incredibly evil bacteria infecting everything it comes into contact with and threatening the world’s existence.
The objective of GravityLine is to lead a very dangerous bacteria through an infected object without bursting its bubble, and to destroy it once and for all in a special chemical mixture. If you burst the bubble, the bacteria (or as we call it - HEB - Huge Evil Bacteria) will spread and your mission will fail! HEB is very vicious, and extracting it from the infected objects can be really tricky - we hope, for the sake of the world, that you'll be able to complete this mission. If not - HEB will spread and all hope is lost! Good luck!

name: Ranch Escape
description:
Ranch Escape - The horse collecting arcade game
Oh no! - The horses have escaped the ranch and are running free.
Can you gather them back to the ranch?
Test your skill at collecting as many horses as you can within the time limit - Try against your friends.
Who can collect the most?

name: Earwyrm
description:
Try different tracks, and see if you can beat your friends at your favourite music.
Earwyrm always provides a reliable gameplay experience from song to song - each level is uniquely derived from your choice of music - and is the same for everyone who tries to race that music.
You don't have to wait - the level is generated in real-time as you listen to the track, and dynamically recognises changes in the music and visualises them immediately.
Earwyrm is a visceral reactive music game like no other. Play it on maximum difficulty to get the highest scores, but look out for when the bass drops!

name: Planet Soccer 2018
description:
Play a happy physics' soccer with super simple controls. The planetary field affects the ball creating different situations. You choose left or right to control your player. Kicks are automatic but the timing and precision are yours. Win the matches and you can be the World Champion. Play against the CPU or with a friend (two players mode).
Planet Soccer is a super casual game. It has an easy gameplay, where you can play with one finger only, but using both hands you can have a better response time, and the agility needed to win the matches. Your controls are: move right and left. Kicks are automatic when the ball reaches your leg. So timing for moving, and a good strategy is the key to become the winner.
The game simulates a tournament, and winning the matches you'll advance in the competition. The game includes 36 teams, with all countries present in the cup among other important nations. Win the matches and become the world champion.
While playing your XP points will increase, and you can release new content, different balls to vary your matches.

name: Seize Halloween Knight
description:
A Unique Strategy game with NEW FRESH Hallowmas Skin. Let's capture the Escaped Sleepy Hollow!
Not like your old puzzle and Strategy games, but even if there were. The ancient Sleepy Hollow gradually awaken, we need to use our wisdom to capture him with magic pumpkins. It is actually now or never for us! Move!
Otherwise, “Seize Halloween Knight” is one of the best-looking games of its genre which also runs smoothly on older devices. Endless and challenging capturing fun! Tons of Stunts to complete!

name: Stickman Awakens
description: Stickman Awakens is a brand-new card role playing game. It sets after League of Stickman II which has been downloaded over 1 million times. We strive to restore the rich fighting skills of the stickman and the strategic lineup mechanism is added to this game. In the game, you will lead your stickman team to take on an amazing adventure, and the super rich gameplay will definitely make you unable to stop!

name: Maglev Metro
description:
In Maglev Metro, utilize state-of-the-art magnetic levitation technology to build a metropolitan rail system, transporting workers and robots beneath the city. Replace aging Manhattan and Berlin subway systems with newer, faster, quieter technology. Enhance your rail system's abilities so that your passengers arrive at their destinations first.
Efficiency is your key to success in this pick-up-and-deliver, tile-laying, engine-building game. Transparent tiles allow your route to overlap your opponents' tracks, winding you along from station to station. Robots efficiently upgrade and adjust your abilities, leveraging unique goals to maximize points. By the end of the game, the game board has morphed into a modern subway map, with brightly-colored routes connecting stations all over the city.

name: Special Forces-S
description:
Will the agents deployed to stop a nuclear development underway successfully make it out?
They need your help!

name: Pocket Dinosaurs to the Moon
description:
Dinosaurs, land-locked for millions of years want to escape Earth!
But the Evil Alien in the space certainly cannot let the Dinosaurs do this.
The Evil Alien drops Meteorite to take down the Dinosaur's space tower.
Help the Dinosaurs to the moon!

name: Puppyman
description: New critters are introduced as the player progresses, with Pork N Bean making an appearance in higher levels. The player will overcome each enemy using a different tactic including jumping, waiting or running. Touching an enemy causes Puppyman to lose bones and reduce the overall score for the level. Some enemies will chase Puppyman causing him to miss collecting his treasures. Avoid the critters, save Pork N Bean, and collect all bounty to achieve the highest possible score.

name: Airman X
description:
Reporting!
「Airman X」 is a casual game that is a challenge against the reaction speeds of its players, in which they can take control of the paratrooper and help him thread his way among obstacles.And you will successfully complete your mission after the paratrooper’s safe landing.
Never forget to collect the medals you win at each game level. For later on you can unlock the endless mode and challenge the extreme mission.

name: Bubble Fire Story
description:
Bubble Fire Story is a casual game, an addictive bubble-shooter game.
The rule is simple, just shooting the enemy's bubbles by your own bubbles.

name: Sleep In Office
description:
What's wrong with sleeping on the job?
Napping at work is now a game!
Sleep In Office is a game about full-on sleeping on the job.
If you do this at your real job you'll get fired, but in the game sleep as much as you can until you get caught by the boss!

name: Caroline's Camera - Rhythm Game
description:
Caroline finds a new part-time job!
The newspaper office is now in crisis as they have no photographer. We are counting on you, trainee photographer Caroline!
From the development team of "Caroline's Work", the new game "Caroline's Camera".
Pick up the rhythm of photographing, press the shutter in the righting timing, and snap an brilliant shot. Take better picutres to hit the headlines. Save them and share with others.

name: Burning Metal
description:
3D combat car refit and multiplayer online competition game. Featuring straightforward gameplay, stunning graphics and breathtaking battle scenes, the game provides intense combat car battles that immerses you in a world of speed, pursuit, collision, and firepower.
The game gives players the chance to experience true speed and multiple well-designed combat cars, A variety of map styles. Up to 10 players can compete simultaneously, with leagues consisting of multiple players!

name: Boxing Holic
description:
I know you have sorted out iPhone and iPod folder.
Boxing Holic is new paradigm puzzle game from sorting out iPhone folder.
Get high score to sort out droped block in a huddle.
Boxing Holic provides Game Center Service, so you can compete ranking with your friends or international user.

name: Blocky 6
description:
Blocky 6 is a challenging puzzle game that you won't be able to put down.
Warning: Each "blocky" only lasts for few turns before turning into rock!
How long can you prevent the rock from filling the board.

name: Line the Balls
description: Connect all colors and fill the board. But watch out, lines will break if they cross or overlap! In some levels, there're tubes that 2 balls can come inside.

name: Micro Battles
description:
Using two buttons (one for each player) on a single device, you can place your portable battleground practically anywhere and challenge any friend you'd like.
Battles are changed on a daily basis, so be sure to open the app every day for another fun challenge.
Let the Micro Battles begin!

name: Circadia
description:
Tap dots and make all the rings hit the white dot at once.
Simple?
Sure, keep telling yourself that.
Try it and see for yourself.

name: Stick Sprint
description: High octane bite-sized challenges await you in a unique hybrid racing experience. Stick Sprint combines the daring acrobatics of Sprint Trucks, the purity of drift racing and frenzied head to head Sprint Car action - all in a stunning stadium setting.

name: HotBlood Drift
description: Download Hotblood Drift, a racing game by which you can feel thrilling drift and exhilarating driving comfort, now, and experience the pleasure yourself.

name: Antarctic Escape
description:
An unusual penguin, 'Penpen' is very sensitive to cold.
He has explored all around The Antarctic to find a warm place, but he hasn't found yet.
One day, 'Penpen' heard about the tropics.
He really wants to go to the tropics, but the Antarctic sea is too cold to swim with him.
Finally, he decided to skip across the surface of the Antarctic sea.
Help 'Penpen' escape the Antarctic!

name: Mad Road Driver
description:
Only a madman would take this road, but you have no choice!
Buckle up and test your reflexes! Burn rubber and outrun the crazed trucker chasing you through the desert wastes.
Swerve around obstacles, collect power-ups and nuts - you're gonna need them!
Put the pedal to the metal and race your friends to the top of the leaderboards!

name: Save the City
description: Each of us would like to drive an ambulance at least once in a lifetime ... In real life it is not so easy to do, but in this game, you can safely travel around the city and provide the people caught in accidents with medical care! You can earn money by performing routine mission in the game, and the "non-stop" where you gain bonuses for the damages caused to other road users. Collect the right amount of money, and buy a new, powerful car! Good luck!

name: Slam Mania
description:
Slam Mania is in a tribute to classic 80s arcade wrestling games, with controls lovingly adapted to the touch screen. Battle a crew of rowdy professional wrestlers including Jobber Joe, Chen Lee, Mad Moose, El Diablo, Kid Turbo, and Beardo.
Play vs. computer to capture and defend the belt, or locally versus a friend in hotseat mode.
Knock down a flung opponent to earn stars. Use stars to dish out heavy damage with power slams, or leap off the turnbuckle for a high flying finishing move!

name: Real Steel Champions
description: Fight alongside 100 million+ fans of Real Steel World Robot Boxing in an epic sequel. Build Your Own Robot Champion and Dominate 10 inspiring Arenas. Create 1000s of unique robots from exclusive and legendary robot parts. Defeat the Legends of the New Real Steel Era & an All-New Mysterious Super Boss to Reign Supreme as The Undisputable Champion!

name: One More Run: Endless Cricket Runner
description:
One More Run is the perfect blend of cricket and endless arcade games. You'll have a tough time finding a more fun cricket game!
T20 is fast and furious. One More Run trumps the breakneck pace of T20 cricket by always putting you in the last over. Hang on to that last wicket and keep going for One More Run! - an endless cricket runner that will have you coming back for more. How much can you run? How far can you go? How many matches can you win?

name: Soccer Swipe & Match 3
description: Test your reaction and agility in this exciting soccer themed swiping and matching game, featuring four different and addictive modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

name: Karza Football Man 2017
description:
Karza Football Man. 2017 is a funny old-style football management game!
You'll have to take the helm of a glorious team which is on the brink of failure.
Will you be able to bring it back to its place in the football hall of fame?
Possibly the most important characteristic of Karza Football Man. 2017 is that the game can be played almost forever, and every time the game will be completely different!

name: CardSurvival: Tropical Island
description:
Card Survival: Tropical Island is a card-based survival experience from the creators of Card Quest.
Experience what life would be like if you were stranded on a desert island, all in a card format.
Explore, craft tools and manage your needs in order to survive in this hostile environment.

name: Real Street Basketball 3D
description:
Real Street BasketBall Dude 3D
Hey Dude! Are you are a Basket ball Freak; so play this new 3D real street basketball ..
dribble the ball, dunk the ball in the basket.
A very addictive and fast paced sporty game to immerse you in the real streets of the NY..

name: The Dark Side Of Mars
description: Survival horror game where you need to find your way through the maze that is the Red Arc Facility. You need to Find four Key cards and one Space Suit to escape the facility alive. Some enemies run and some relentlessly follow you and all you have is a torch.

name: Startales
description: Sail away into the sky to find your true love! Soar into the heavens and as far as outer space to touch the stars, balance from cloud to cloud and use momentum to acquire speed so you can zip along at high speeds traveling ever farther and farther. Two tiny stars in the sky, an impossible love affair, a relentless shadow pursuing you : You are the last hope for their union, so they can dance and glow together in the glorious night of their love.

name: Rush Galaxy
description:
Fearless warriors, wear your helmet, set foot on your ship, and go toward the deepest of your universe! The only thing you need is speed.
Do you want to drive the super speed of the spaceship in the vastness of the galaxy? Do you want to experience the thrill of the shuttle in a messy meteorites? Do you want to challenge your reaction speed and limitation? So, you can't miss this game - Rush Galaxy.

name: Pogo Pogo World
description: Welcome to Pogo Pogo World! Maneuver Pogo Bunny through the spikes and over the mushrooms, but don't pogo too high. Stay close to the ground in this endless running POGO adventure! Check out the ad free full version.

name: Four Squares
description: Four Squares is a game of memory, skill, and concentration. Watch what happens each turn and repeat what you see. Each time you successfully repeat the sequence it is lengthened, the speed increases, and your thinking time is shortened. Keep practising, work your way up the leaderboards, and challenge your friends.

name: Gnome Dash: Rise of the Trolls
description:
Fly, Bounce, Run, Dig, and Laugh through an Endless Magical Adventure!
Long Ago a wise Gnome foretold of a day when trolls would rise up and take these magical lands from the Gnomes... Today is that day and with the help of wise fairies and joyous creatures it is up to you to search and scour the magical worlds with wit and speed to complete all quests and find the pieces to put together Project: SWIFT a cybernetic fox, or it may be the end as we know it...
Are you Gnome enough to save us all?

name: Rock Hero: Guitar Legend
description:
You love music? You love Guitar Hero game?
You love Rock Band game?
You will love this tap tap music rhythm game.
A fun way to play with your music.

name: Mans Not Hot
description: Man can NEVER be hot!

name: Baby Flash Cards: Car Sounds
description: Sin descripción

name: Bots Boom Bang
description:
The coolest bots ever.
Dive into the world of bits & bytes and experience the grooviest bots of all time. Bots Boom Bang is funky, groovy, fun - in a word, different. A brand new challenge awaits you: solve the schematics to help the bots find each other. Use the power items to clear your path through the levels. Use the craziest wheel of fortune you've ever spun and win great prizes. Are you in?

name: Meet Ball Girls
description: Boys like to play ball, and they prefer to play with beautiful girls. . .

name: Metal Gear Solid
description: Before being cancelled, a version of Metal Gear Solid was in development for the ill-fated Game.com, a portable console released by Tiger Electronics in 1997. It seems that the game was going to be a port of Metal Gear Solid PSX.

name: Fist Tower
description: Repair buildings with your fists. Reach higher floors!

name: A Nanobot
description: Not so long time ago in a galaxy far away Censorship bugs were born. To infect everyone is their purpose. The only hope is you. Be brave you must and feel no fear.

name: Collect iT 3D
description:
Do you like puzzle type of games?
Well, this one will be fun, because it is physics-based where you have to collect all balls and have them all added into the basket or the bin. In other words, you have to arrange things on each level where all yellow balls fall into the bin.
You control a magic saw that can cut through platforms in order to make a clear path for the balls to move. Each level has a different setup and some levels are relatively easy to play. It gets more challenging as you progress, so there's definitely a level progression. You have an option to skip a level if it is too challenging, but that's up to you.

name: Fun with Cubes
description:
Rotate cubes to create patterns, and enjoy the beauty of your creations.
In the mood for a little competition? Try and match patterns with as few moves as possible, and get yourself a place on the global leaderboard.
Have fun.

name: Ace Arrow
description:
It is an archery game that shoots a moving target with an arrow.
There are various patterns of mobile targets.
Test your archery skills.

name: Shot Online: Golf Battle
description: Enjoy real-time (parallel) golf battles and experience our incredible golf clubs.

name: Shop Heroes Legends: Idle RPG
description:
Shop Heroes Legends—the much anticipated sequel to Shop Heroes is about to be released worldwide! On this wonderful journey of forging, you can solve brand new challenges, develop your business globally and become the Epic Shop Tycoon!
One day, you were led to your Uncle's poorly managed equipment shop by his best friend Jack. The shop almost went bankrupt because of your uncle's mismanagement. Now, it is your mission to take over this empty little shop and miraculously turn it into a business empire. Are you ready to become a Shop Tycoon?

name: Horse Racing Manager 2020
description:
Become the number one horse racing manager to grace the tracks! Race, train, breed from the local derby to the Ultimate Championship.
Compete against other jockeys online from around the globe and compete in new events daily!

name: Apex Race Manager 2019
description: Are you up for the Apex Race Manager challenge?

name: Shavalyn Pop
description: Help our friend Shavalyn Pop escape from this alien trap.

name: Demolition Dodge
description:
Buckle up and get ready for the ride of your life with Demolition Dodge - the new exciting and addictive survival racing game from insurance specialist Adrian Flux.
Battle your way around the carnage-packed arena in your chosen car, collecting rewards, racing and dodging the deadly opponents trying their best to get between you and your prize.

name: Robot Clash Run
description:
Run, dash and clash with robots and drones in Robot Clash Run! Sprint through a unique, fun, fast and challenging endless runner with endless colorful slopes, twists, turns and tunnels.
Jump, kick, fly and switch lanes as you run through fun arcade-style levels, catching as many burgers, fries and pizzas as you can! The more you grab, the more points you earn! Test your reflexes in this addicting platformer that leaves you running back for more.
Clash and defend Earth from a Clan of Evil Robots and Drones as you run, jump and kick them off every platform, even in the sky! Sound easy? Dodge hundreds of obstacles and see how far you can run!

name: Freaky Racing
description:
The ultimate retro racing experience for your phone or tablet!
How long can you stay on the road in this addictive retro racer?
Dodge opponents and potholes as you power down the racetrack at blazing speed!

name: Great Race: Route 66
description:
Cruise across America on the famous Route 66, all the way from lush Illinois to the shores of California!
Choose your favourite Classic Car from a vintage collection and beat the competition, but remember to stop every now and then to enjoy the attractions along the way.

name: Canyon Miner: Minecart Rush
description: Get ready for the seat of your pants wild ride of your life - on a minecart! Navigate through the Old Mine as you search for Gems! This isn't the friendliest mine though. Bottomless pits, sharp hanging rocks, and giant Bats and Spiders make this one challenging run. Can you handle the pressure? Can you fill your pockets? Gamecenter lets you compete for high scores.

name: SailCraft
description:
Forge your naval fleet and enter the Arena! "SailCraft" mixes classic battleship rules with brand-new warship skills, we are trying to create the most amazing and innovative gaming experience for you.
You can recruit a variety of warships into your fleet, including glorious human warships, tough dwarf submarines, and elegant elf magic ships. From the numerous fleet combinations, formations and various tactics, there must be one that was made for you perfectly!

name: Flip Trip
description: Flip Trip is a game of precise timing! Stay on your hands and feet and keep flipping as far as you can! Beat your high score and make it on the leaderboards! Unlock special characters and flip your way to victory!

name: Spell Caster: Puzzle RPG
description: Sharpen your vocabulary and test your language skills at the same time by playing this spelling game with RPG elements. Battle against cool, vicious monsters as you progress further into the dungeon. Words get more and more complex the further you get, making the enemies more and more difficult to defeat. Level up as you progress to give you a fighting chance. Make it to the end to see all of the different enemies and areas.

name: Letter Stack
description: Letter Stack is a fast-paced word stacking game where you challenge friends to see who can unjumble and stack words the fastest. Easy to learn, hard to master! Drag and stack letter blocks to form words. Stack as many words as you can before time runs out!

name: Letter Fall: Swipe Letters
description: A rain of letters is awesome, but not all the letters are good. There are "bad letters" that you must prevent them...

name: Spell Breakers
description:
SpellBreakers is the most advanced and the only real-time action word puzzle game ever! Spell Breakers will test your skills and knowledge.
Simply, you capture your opponent's letters by spelling words.
Each player tries to dominate the board to get even more letters. When the time is up, the highest scorer wins.

name: Letris 4
description: Letris is one of the most popular AppStore word games. You have to build words to keep the screen clear and empty for as long as possible. It’s based on a simple idea that will keep you hooked, encouraging you to go on to the next level and beat your own record.

name: SpellUp
description: Relax and Lose yourself in a magical world of Zodiacs and Words in SpellUp, an addictive word game.

name: Icontrivia: Guess the Dogs
description:
From to Chihuahua to Great Dane it’s time to guess all your favorite dog breeds.
How well do you know about our four legged companions? Guess all the canine friends in this highly addictive word guessing game.
Hints & Help: Struggling to guess an dog? You can reveal or remove letters to help you figure it out.

name: Flurry Words
description:
A stunning word game for everyone! Do you know how many words you use? Do you know more than your friends? The average person knows about 8000 words; do you consider yourself above average?
Challenge your friends! Challenge your relatives! Challenge your foes to a word battle! The world has never seen a massacre as aesthetic as this one! Many have fled, but will you? Use your mind to become the one and only champion amidst all the witty others!

name: AutoCompete
description:
Can you guess the crazy, funny, weird ways Google will autocomplete popular searches? Play the four basic categories: Culture, People, Names and Questions. And, exclusively for the app, play new categories such as Food, Movies, and Music!
Challenge your friends and see who can get the most points!

name: Mini Crossword Puzzles
description: If you are a crossword puzzle fan, that’s great. I you are not a crossword puzzle fan, the time has come to become one! ‘Crossword Games Mini’ will soon become your favourite mini crossword puzzle.

name: One Hit Cowboy
description:
One Hit Cowboy is featured as “New game we love” and "Best new updates" "in more than 120 countries(regions) ! Including US, Canada, UK, France, China, HK, Taiwan etc..
One Hit Cowboy is a very addictive and challenging arcade game.
You're a lone cowboy, armed with your trusty revolver. You only have one bullet for dealing with each bandit.
Time your shots, pull the trigger fast and precise. Miss one? You're dead as a door nail.
Are you ready to face-off with all kinds of gunslingin' bandits? Let's see if you're the fastest gun in the West!

name: The Numzle
description:
You have to combine numbers which are equal or 10 in total. Clear all numbers to win the sheet.
There are 360 levels to pass and the classic game which can be played for hours. Started games are saved so you can continue later.
Train your brain and master the most difficult levels.

name: The Harvest 3D
description: In this science-fiction-themed action RPG set in a distant future, hostile aliens are out to turn Earth’s organic life into cyborgs. These aliens, known as The Harvesters, use humans and animals to create cyborgs: crude amalgamations of flesh and machinery.

name: The Flute
description:
Experience a masterpiece inspired by the work of a genius.
 The game follows the adventure of Prince Tamino who fights serpents and creatures in his quest to rescue Princess Pamina,  the daughter of the Queen of the Night.

name: TD Quest
description: This game contains real time strategy elements, tower defense rules, and a innovative combat system. In combat, players can operate front-row characters to confront enemies or avoid enemy attacks, while back-row characters assume the roles of damage, control, heal and so on. A player can switch the jobs of the rear characters according to the combat situation and must protect the crystal from being destroyed.

name: Tap to Dive
description: A simple tilt-and-tap game.

name: TapLab
description:
Greetings, Professor Taplab here!
After much experimentation I have discovered the key to infinite possibilities.
I've created a formula so amazing, it will create anything you can imagine!
but is not with out its risks... I need your help!

name: Tank Squad: Battle Hero
description:
The Dark Tanks are trying to conquer our land! Guard your headquarters! Destroy all enemy tanks! As a hero captain, fight for honor!
Pocket Tank Wars is a modern style NES / FC Battle City with new attractive elements.
Remember, you are not fighting alone! In Pocket Tank Wars, there are ally tanks who will defend the base with you. Come and lead your teammates to fight with the enemies!

name: Tales of a Viking: Episode One
description: Tales of a Viking: Episode One is a small-scale turn-based strategy game with rpg elements.

name: Swipey Maze
description:
Find the key to unlock the block and escape the maze!
Escape quickly, or master each labyrinth by collecting all 3 stars first!
Spend keys to unlock new trail effects!
Collect stars to prove your skills!

name: Toon Puzzle Island
description: Toon Puzzle Quest is an interesting match 3 game. Challenge your hand-eye coordination and reaction! The game is highly addictive and challenging.

name: Too Many Snakes
description:
Help Jessie the mouse escape from bothersome snakes using super-psychic-mouse powers!
Can you solve all 75 mind-bending puzzles and help Jessie get back home safely?
A literal twist on the classic sliding-blocks puzzle game, Too Many Snakes swaps rigid blocks for flexible snakes that must be pulled and bent out of the way to reveal the exit for Jessie to escape. Collect Gold Stars by solving levels in the fewest moves possible!

name: Tiny Goalie
description: Dive your goalie to save oncoming soccer balls and avoid flying water bottles.

name: Tile Star 2
description: Tile Star 2 — is a puzzle game. Make all tiles yellow color to complete each level. You only have a set number of moves to complete each level. Clicking one tile would change its and its neighbors color.

name: Tiffany Alvord Dream World
description:
Tiffany Alvord’s first official game! Live a life of music, glamor, and endless fashion choices! Look fabulous, sound great, meet interesting new people, and put on a stellar show in! The YouTube sensation comes to your mobile device like never before!
Musician extraordinaire Tiffany Alvord knows what it takes to become a superstar. Tiffany’s advice on the ups and downs of the music business will be essential to your rise to stardom. With her model’s fashion sense, charm, soulful performances, and enthralling vocals, Tiffany Alvord will guide you to become the superstar you’ve always dreamed of being.
Let Tiffany help you turn your fantasy of fame and success into reality! Your avatar will perform on stage, dress up in the most stylish clothes, interact with fellow stars, recruit members for your band, and pose for photo shoots in your very own studio! But that’s just the beginning; there are a lot more cool jobs to do, new people to meet, awards to win, and fun mini-games to play!
Even someone with as much talent as Tiffany had to start somewhere, and it will take just as much hard work until your first breakthrough. Don’t hesitate—your dazzling debut awaits and Tiffany Alvord will show you the way!

name: Tic-Tac-Toast
description: Just like traditional Tic-Tac-Toe, try to get three in a row in any direction before your opponent. But beginning with your fourth move, your oldest move will DISAPPEAR with every new turn! Incredibly simple, yet amazingly challenging.

name: Tiana Saves Xmas
description:
Santa is getting ready to deliver all the presents for Christmas and they all got blown away in the wind.
Help the head elf Tiana save Christmas by collecting all the presents with Santa's sleigh, so all the kids around the world will get their Christmas presents in time.
Don't forget to keep the reindeer fed with carrots so they can use their magic to fly.
Watch out for the snowballs that will end the game.
Good luck!

name: Three Hoops
description:
It is a game where you put the ball in the hoop of the same color.
The method of moving the hoop is to move left and right while touching the screen.
Good luck.

name: Tricky Geometry
description:
Jump and dash your way in Tricky Geometry, near impossible running game. Tap to jump and flip through the tricky squares and spiky obstacles !
Cross designed geometry levels, think and jump fast the tricky squares obstacles, every square color behave differently and can be unpredictable, challenge your limits! Simple one touch game play that will keep you entertained for hours! Play Tricky Geometry, Dash and Jump,enjoy it as much as you can!

name: Tricky Questions
description:
4 types of levels! Choose one pic as an answer.
Get smart with our Tricky Questions game!

name: Trabi vs. Zombies: Apocalypse VR
description:
Kill zombies with your deadly weapon - upgraded car from East Germany!
Zombie apocalypse is coming! Kill so many zombies as is possible and stay alive. You have got powerful weapon, car from East Germany - Trabant! You can play survive highway or accomplish hard, nearly impossible missions.
Upgrade your Trabi to deadly weapon. Buy more rockets, bigger fuel or powerful jet. There is also deadly Blade.

name: Who's the Celeb?
description:
Think you know your athletes, actors, and music stars? Test your knowledge as you try to unscramble the letters of these celebrities displayed in the pic.
Do you have what it takes to hang with the world's most powerful elite like Kim Kardashian, Brad Pitt and LeBron James? Let's find out.

name: Wild Roads
description:
Test your driving skill and anticipation with "Wild Roads", a simple, fun and highly addictive game.
The goal? Go as far as possible with your shipment. But beware, if you end up dropping all of your cages, you will only have to return to the starting point in an attempt to set a new record.
"Wild roads", it's more than 50 characters and 20 vehicles to unlock !
Here is a game that will delight all players looking for a casual, fun and original game.
In addition, it's free, so do not hesitate!

name: Wildshade Fantasy Horse Races
description:
Have you heard of the Wildshade horses? Breed your dream horse with over 40 million options, equip each horse with matching tack, and prove that you are worthy of the legendary Wildshade herd. Win magical horse races in a fantastical, adventure-filled world!
Long ago, once a year near the village of Wildshade, something magical took place. A rainbow glow filled the sky, a sign that the wild horses of Wildshade had returned! Nobody knew where they came from or where they would return to. But one thing they did know for sure was that the horses were proud, brave, and worthy of respect. The villagers gathered for a race, each horse choosing their own rider. No sooner were they on the horse than each rider felt free, unbeatable.
And then, tragedy struck: the village and the surrounding area caught fire, the flames were unstoppable. The Wildshade horses never returned. The village was rebuilt and the people returned, the landscape recovered, but there was no sign of the horses.
The people in the village held horse races in memory of those beautiful wild beasts, trying to recapture those magical moments of the past when the horses would appear and the wild race began.
And now you, too can experience the magic of the Wildshade horses, thanks to Wildshade the game. There are plenty of wild horse races and beautiful, fantastic horses just waiting to meet you!

name: Whiskers
description: Size is the name of the game in Whiskers. Collect kitty food to grow bigger, and use four unique powerups to steal size from your friends. Become as big as the screen and you win! Pick from over 50 mustaches for your adorable pixel kitten and then do battle with up to three of your friends.

name: Wheels on Fire
description:
Fasten your seat belts and be prepared for a high-speed-experience. One simple goal: Go as far as possible. Step on the gas. Avoid the other cars on the street. Feel the power of speed.
The game is fully controlled with the accelerometer.
Do you have what it takes for THIS experience...?

name: What's the Year
description: What’s The Year is a new quiz where your knowledge can be tested. What do you know about ww1 or ww2? What do you know in general? With this fantastic quiz you can show off your skills and how good you really are. See who gets the highest score among your friends.

name: What's the Movie?
description:
Think you're the biggest movie junkie?
Test your knowledge on more than 290+ levels as you try to unscramble the letters to find the title of movie displayed in the pic.
Feeling stuck? Reach out to your friends and followers, or use the in game powerups for help.

name: What's the Baby Animal?
description: Everyone loves Baby Animals, but how well do you know them? What’s The Baby Animal? is all about kittens, puppies, chicks, ducklings and other adorable animals.

name: Vertigo: Binaural Beats
description:
Beware! The game might take you over after some time of gameplay!
In an altered reality parallel universe you as the glowing dot named "vertigo" try to escape the impossible maze with traps!

name: Versus: Boys and Girls
description: Girls versus Boys is a world-wide challenge to once and for all decide which gender is king-of-the-hill. Play as either Girl or Boy and gather points to improve your team score.

name: Various Daylife: Mobile
description: In the year 211 of the Imperial Era, a new continent was discovered. Explore its every last corner as a settler of Antoecia, while living your life to the fullest in the city of Erebia.

name: US Basketball HD
description:
Become basketball star wherever you go!
When there is no opportunity to play real basketball, enjoy virtual US Basketball!
Who says that basketball can be played just with basketball on the sports ground? Compete with your friends on the screen of your devices using various spherical objects with unique characteristics – bowling and billiard balls, and even symbolic ball characters.
Take the most comfortable ball and set up records!
Playing basketball visit famous places of the USA!

name: Undead Carnage League
description:
A virus broke out of the inner cities, zombies spread across the planet, and now… life’s pretty boring. What do you do for fun in a post-apocalyptic world? Jump in your car and join the Undead Carnage League.
Join the elite zombie smashers, hit the road and run down as many of the drooling mindless horde as you can, grabbing their gold teeth and avoiding obstacles and zombie rockets. The more gold teeth you collect, the more choices you have to upgrade to some sweet new wheels. Compete against other dangerous drivers and throw them off course with your own explosive ammo to top the global leaderboard for the highest honour - the Undead Carnage League trophy.

name: Ultimate Dice Wars: Reborn
description: Ultimate Dice Wars: Reborn is a turned-based strategy game similar to Risk. Dice Wars is a combination of strategy and luck. The better your strategy the less you rely on luck.

name: Words with AI
description: English version of famous Russian word game Erudite, originally inspired by Scrabble. The game is meant to enrich vocabulary and develop logical thinking. You need to compose words on a game field with tiles of different value. Unlike original game there are some differences: you can put several words at a turn, starting 7-letter word is always placed on start, etc.

name: Word Stitch
description:
Word Stitch is a charming crossword game that’s way more than it “seams.” The words you find become patches for knitting beautiful and charming quilts! Fun and appropriate for all ages, you can play alone or cozied up to the same screen together. Make it a nightly spelling regimine for your kids, or just challenge yourself to the game’s hundreds of tailored levels. Sewing and crochet are the world’s most popular hobby, and now it’s in lovable word game form on your phone!
Privacy Notice: Word Stitch collects your device’s IP address, advertising ID, and other partner specific identifiers. These identifiers enable personalized ads and analytics to improve our game. Opt-out or learn more by visiting our Privacy Center, accessible from the game's settings.

name: Words Scramble
description: Swap letters to unscramble words in this fun app. The letters are all laid out and all you have to do is decipher the words describing the beautiful images. So what are you waiting for, challenge yourself with a great combination of words and pictures. You also get to build your vocabulary on the way!

name: Word Search Puzzle: Word Balls
description:
Sit back, take a deep breath, relax and challenge yourself with Word Balls, the best word puzzle game.
Every level has a unique subject with many words that are split into different balls. Your goal is to combine the letters in order to find the words! Simple and understandable but at the same time challenging and amusing, Word Balls delivers your daily brain training!

name: Word Choices
description:
Have you ever thought about what it would be like to have all your favorite and new word games at one place? Well! Look no further.
Word Choices offers a collection of the best of Word Searching, Crosswords, Anagram & Picture crossword games. Find the hidden words, test your vocabulary, spelling & puzzle solving skills with this incredibly addicting bouquet of word games.

name: Worded!
description:
Worded! is a fun new word game that is easy to learn and challenging to master. If you like word games then you will love this amazing indie game. It combines word search with board and tile spelling games and real world physics to create a unique and entertaining word game experience.
You select the letters that can spell a word and then you arrange them into the word that you want to spell. More tiles will fall with each word that you find so your words must be long enough to prevent the board from filling up. Earn coins by finding longer words with rarer letters to buy powerups that destroy tiles and help you find even longer words.

name: Wordgraphy
description: Wordgraphy is a new word game experience that limits your possible moves with letter groups to push you to think different words.

name: Word Safe
description:
Love word games, but bored with Boggle clones? Give Word Safe a try, it is a simple but addictive game of combining letters to make words. Instead of using the typical grid of letters, use the combination lock to make as many words as possible.
Words must be at least 3 letters long. Longer words are worth more points than short words so plan accordingly.

name: Word Boxing
description: Improve your reaction speed and basic knowledge!

name: Word Adventure
description:
If you like word games, you have to take a look at Word Adventure. It's a brand new kind of Word Game!
Join us in this exciting adventure spanning through many different fantasy worlds. Travel through magical lands, visit amazing places and meet all kinds of cute creatures along the way.
Word Adventure is a single player word game that combines puzzle elements with a word game. You tap squares of letters to create words, but what really makes it stand out from other similar games is the possibility to move letters horizontally & vertically. You have never seen anything like this before, brand new gameplay mechanism!

name: Wonder Wheel
description:
Discover the Wonders of the Wheel! Each Wonder contains three images which, when combined correctly, reveal a movie, artist or famous person.
A British flag? A knee? Some old spears? Brit.. knee.. spears..
To master the Wonder Wheel you'll need to solve cryptic clues, use phonetic phrases and twist your tongue. Can you solve them all and discover all the Wonders?

name: Winner's Soccer Evolution
description: Winner’s Soccer 2014 is a real 3D competitive football game. It includes the teams and the latest football players’ data of 2014 World Cup. There are various modes for you to select, such as Cup, League Match and Friendly Match. It has up to 126 teams and 2600 players. Smooth actions and playback function let you feel like you actually in the game.

name: Willy's Wonderland
description:
Welcome to Willy's Wonderland! But something isn't quite right...
Join the Janitor and Liv to battle it out and free the place from Willy and his henchmen!

name: Wild Wolf Family Simulator 3D
description: Ready to attack with pounce as a wild wolf in this wolf simulator. Go around big fantasy jungle and attack viciously by using your sharp claws and sensitive ears to navigate the prey in this low poly game with your ultimate wolf. Leading a family pack of cubs and a mate, your job is to protect and feed them. Start battle in high resolution forest as an arctic wolf also with wild wolf sim. Play this wild life game with multiple wolf quests in best 3D wolf game. Wolf simulator games to raise a family were never been so thrilling. Most wanted fantasy story of ultimate wolf is here. Play as realistic wild wolf and survive in the wilderness of forest with our Wild Wolf Family Simulator 3D.

name: Zombie Brains
description: Help the hungriest zombie on the app store by dodge, jump and swiping your way to freedom.

name: Worry_Bead
description: Restful, Relaxing, Fun at a low, low price. Flip, Spin or Fiddle the Beads in manner that suits you. Use a two finger motion to set the bead size. This sole use or "pass around on a single device" game will show at least one virtual bead that the user can fiddle with single finger actions. There will be more beads on devices with larger screens. There is no demand to move fast or slow, so the APP could be used to burn off excess energy or stress. As a game, multiple users can pass the device around and try to mimic the bead arrangement on the other tab. The APP could also be used as a dexterity test, where someone would make requested changes to all the beads within a certain time.

name: Stay Human
description: Explore a hex based procedurally generated cityscape, infested with assorted zombies, collect powerful and novel zombie slaying weapons, medical supplies and food. Rescue fellow survivors to grow your party, defeat powerful zombie bosses, escape the city... but most importantly... Stay Human!

name: BraverBots
description: BraverBots is a turn-based strategy game like no other. Assemble a team from your fleet of Bots, battle and defeat opponents in short online matches, and become champion of the Galactic Bots League.

name: Nurtured Human Plan: Meet a Date
description: Pixel beauty girl love raising game！Let's take it as the author's personal delusion!

name: Primal Hunt
description:
You are invited to the greatest Hunt in history! Journey through prehistoric biomes, tracking down and going one-on-one with the most dangerous creatures to have ever walked the earth, DINOSAURS. Face the ferocity of a pack of Raptors, the strength, and power of an eight-ton Triceratops, or the terror of a 30-ft Tyrannosaurus Rex.
With an arsenal of high-tech weapons and armor at your disposal, you are poised to become the ultimate hunter…if you can survive. As you master each hunt, your prey becomes more dangerous as they are upgraded with advanced cybernetic enhancements, equipped with armor, carbine machine guns, rocket launchers, and the lethal ion cannon.
Rise to the challenge! Face the danger of putting yourself in the path of nature’s most feared creatures, risk everything for the ultimate thrill, and flirt with immortality to secure your place in history as the greatest hunter to have ever lived.

name: LizardSpock
description: Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock

name: Not those monsters again...
description: Shoot'em up for Playdate

name: Handshakes: Hands On
description: Handshakes: Hands On is the follow up to Handshakes, the sokoban puzzler about shaking hands. Take your brain for a stroll with all new mechanics, non-linear progression, community level editor and more.

name: Beach Cafe: Caribbean Sand
description: Follow the clues of your grandfather's disappearance and unveil all the mysteries hidden in this abandoned place. Will you be able to find out what happened?

name: Starlite: Defender of Justice Ultimate HD Edition
description: In the year 2170 an alien threat known as the CYRONS invaded the planet Earth with intent of hostile takeover. Play as "AGENT 69" in the this fast paced Cyberpunk, Hack and Slash action game!

name: Stream Runners: Heroes
description: Stream Runners: Heroes is a retro style idle game for live streamers to play with their viewers on Twitch. Players can add Runners to the game using channel points on stream to fight enemies, earn points for their lane, and defeat bosses. There are many ways to use this game with your community, it's all up to you and your chat!

name: Fingers' Dating
description: It's the happiest thing to do on a date with a girl, but maybe it's just you tonight.

name: BoomSweeper VR
description: Hands > Mice! BoomSweeperVR is a classic puzzle game re-imagined from a whole new perspective. Sit back, kick your feet up, and unwind with one of the most addictive and beloved games of all time. Featuring achievements and three levels of difficulty for newcomers and 90's desktop veterans.

name: Dardeep
description: A brave miner falls into an endless stone cave, taking with him only a pickaxe. The only chance to survive is is to dig and find keys to locked doors.

name: The Rocket Jumper
description: The Rocket Jumper is a 3D platformer that puts a twist on traditional gameplay by incorporating rocket jumping as the main element.

name: A Legend of Wisdom
description: Enter the fantasy world and feel what it's like to be a real traveler! Create, try new spells and face the greatest evil in this world!

name: Torrential
description: Prepare yourself for a bit of a challenge. Simple but difficult bullet hell, semi-similar to the classics with modernized controls. Cuts to the chase with only boss levels, no filler in between, just a torrent of bullets.

name: The Justitia Files
description: Sophie Aleth is the latest hire at Justitia Consultants, a firm that handles other companies' problems discreetly and with professionalism. This game covers theories and concepts of the business world through the lens of an interactive story.

name: Stella's Pointless Castle Awakening
description: A female knight, her spear, her lamp and a mysterious castle. An exciting adventure awaits ahead! Stella's Pointless Castle Awakening is a 3rd-person puzzle adventure with a slice of arcade flavour.

name: Droid Wars: Duel
description: Sci-Fi Arcade Old-Style PvP ! No multiplayer, matchmaking, lobby waiting...just pure fun with your friends. Choose your nicks, gender, equip and head on to excitement. Sure, there is lot more to it, you'll find out eventually...welcome !

name: Flaming Thunderer
description: Flaming Thunderer is an action-platformer with adventure elements. Darkness has overtaken your village, monsters have come to your lands.

name: Dark Night Maze
description: "Dark Night Maze" is a very challenging maze adventure game, the biggest feature of the game is super difficult to clear the level, players need to collect various equipment, improve their abilities, find the exit to win.

name: Fantasya
description: The planet of Fantasya is in crisis from Planet Eater. Let's save the planet Fantasya by dispatching a commando from the planet Ndev, a planetary protection agency. Character defense using cute SD characters, choose the skills the characters have to your liking and unfold various tactics.

name: Wojak Rush
description: Are you ready to embark on a relentless struggle to wake the Wojak, who has had a strange dream, from his dream? Wojak Rush is a cartoon themed adventure game that combines parkour and rogue-like game mechanics that you will use against hundreds of monsters that come upon you.

name: Adventurer Flower
description: You're a flower in an office and there are three hidden games based on balance and memory challenges in there.

name: The Secret Ops
description: You just finished a secret mission, but there was an accident in the headquarters you belong to. You are now an experienced agent who will solve the leak crisis at the headquarters. Here you'll encounter a variety of enemies, they can be stupid, but some are also very cunning. Well, good luck.

name: Meka Sigurat
description: A hardcore, mechanically deranged wave shooter! Shoot robots to your hearts content! Collect items! Upgrade yourself! Deny any meaning whatsoever!

name: Deep in the Snowy Night
description: A challenging, winter-themed horror experience

name: Void Rifter XR
description: High speed dynamic multiplayer mech boomer shooter with full mech customization!

name: Synthetic Days
description: Sin descripción

name: Easy Game
description: Easy Game is a platformer game that breaks through the stage to avoid obstacles by stepping on the treadmill. The player aims to avoid various obstacles in the game and finally catch the boss monster.

name: Jungle Bomb Fever
description: Kinshen Island was captured by a large army of the enemy. Strategically important object was tasked with freeing the best squad you ever led.

name: Deadly Desire
description: An FPS shooter story game set in the Haluwa at the beginning of the Calculus pandemic. Answering the question "What if they were right?"

name: Lost Between
