description: A girl who lost her memory woke up after a nightmare, looking for her parents to find she lives in another nightmare, kill enemies, solve puzzles, use the environment for your advantage, explore endless clues , search your way to survive the nightmare and find your parent and your peace.

name: Music Inc
description: Music Inc - a game that allows you to envelop yourself in the world of music production.

name: Nikki no Tabisuru Quiz
description: Nikki no Tabisuru Quiz was a Japanese only Club Nintendo game which quizzed users about their knowledge on Japan which 3DS users could download

name: Game & Watch-e: Manhole
description: A cancelled remake of Manhole meant to be released for the e-Reader. It was represented by a white Luigi on the package of the cancelled Game & Watch-e Collection. It was one of the games in the Collector Version.

name: Tales of Demons and Gods
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Tangle
description: Sin descripción

name: Crazy Golf Cat
description: Sin descripción

name: Real Baseball 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Magic Fantasy
description: Sin descripción

name: Game & Watch-e: Fire
description: A cancelled port of Fire (the 1997 remake) for the e-Reader.

name: Game & Watch-e: Fire
description: A cancelled port of Fire for the e-Reader.

name: Game & Watch-e: Octopus
description: A cancelled port of Octopus (the 1997 remake) for the e-Reader.

name: I Hate Zombies
description: Sin descripción

name: Kombo
description: Kombo – Word Trivia Game is a fun game that lets you play with words and letters. It is a complete learning with fun game which mixes crosswords, anagrams, trivia and word puzzle. You get hints that describe the word. Just guess the correct word and keep learning to keep scoring. The hint also includes the number of letters the word has to help you guess the words and make the right guess. The combination of letters are also provided but with a twist. All the combination are jumbled. You need to join the combination of letters to guess the correct word. Interesting thing is as you keep guessing the words, it becomes even more easier to guess other words that follow.

name: Game & Watch-e: Octopus
description: A cancelled port of Octopus for the e-Reader.

name: Rapid Rocket
description: Feel like a challenge? Guide the rocket through the rocks in this amazing, fast-paced and exciting game.

name: Game & Watch-e: Spitball Sparky
description: A cancelled port of Spitball Sparky for the e-Reader.

name: Old Maid
description:
A timeless classic card game with a fun new look for the iPhone! Now with Game Center integration! We've added Game Statistics, Instructions, Awards and Leaderboards as well as several great new professions!
Hours of entertainment for kids and adults. Colorful, filled with zany characters, easy to play. Pick cards and match pairs, but don't get stuck with the Old Maid!

name: Game & Watch-e: Vermin
description: A cancelled port of Vermin (the 1997 remake) for the e-Reader.

name: Game & Watch-e: Vermin
description: Cancelled port of Vermin (the original version) for the e-Reader.

name: Befuddle
description: Befuddle is a cozy multiplayer party game where players take turns decoding the addictive word puzzles of your favourite songs, books, films and video games! Deliberate, deduce and decipher the mixed up titles with your friends or Twitch viewers and see who’s the best Befuddler!

name: Awkward 2
description: Awkward 2 is the adult multiplayer party game filled with dark, hilarious & sometimes downright disturbing questions. Laugh, debate, defend and find out things you never wanted to know about your friends and Twitch viewers!

name: Illumina
description: Sin descripción

name: Ben 10: Omniverse Undertown Chase
description: Sin descripción

name: Gumball Rainbow Ruckus
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle of Heroes: Land of Immortals
description: Sin descripción

name: Bud Farm: Grass Roots
description: Bud Farm: Grass Roots is a wildly hilarious and quirky weed farming simulation that is free to download, and insanely fun to play. In this strange but wonderful idle simulation tap game, you start running your very own Idle weed business while working to manage and expand your farm.

name: The Parrot that Summons Demons
description:
Once the pet of an evil worshiper... Now adopted by an unlucky family!

The Parrot That Summons Demons is a family tragedy/horror FMV game featuring a surprisingly deep, dark and unsettling story by the creators of Bloody Service.

name: Unbelievaboom!
description: This title is an explosive soccer shooter based on the concept that explosions are fun. Use bombs and exploding bullets to blow up your surroundings and aim for the goal! In this title, you can blow up not only enemies and balls, but also yourself, goal posts, and everything else!

name: Douchebag Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 Limited Edition
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 Limited Edition was going to be a compilation of Sonic the Hedgehog 3 and Sonic & Knuckles for the Sega Mega Drive. This would be similar to what happens when locking the two games together with Sonic & Knuckles' Lock-On Technology. It would essentially be Sonic the Hedgehog 3 & Knuckles, but it would have been contained in a single cartridge and thus probably would have had a cheaper price. It is unknown whether it would have had a port allowing for Lock-On Technology so compatibility with other cartridges is also unknown.

name: Sister Sonic
description: Sister Sonic is a cancelled rebranding of the Mega-CD platform role-playing game Popful Mail announced in late 1992.

name: Sonic Sports
description: Sonic Sports is an unreleased that was in development for the Sega 32X in 1995. The March 1995 issue of Game Players described the game as being similar to Acme All-Stars but using Sega characters instead. These characters included Sonic, Tails, and Ristar. Games hinted at being available included basketball, volleyball, and soccer.

name: Scooby-Doo: Mayan Mayhem!
description: Sin descripción

name: Death Row
description: Sin descripción

name: Popeye
description: A cancelled game based on the Popeye franchise. Given that Nintendo couldn't get the rights for the franchise, they transformed the game into "Donkey Kong".

name: Rift Breach
description: A sci-fi dungeon crawler where you choose the next room. Your options are rarely beneficial, with random traps, puzzles and enemies lying in wait. Act quickly, for failure to manage your situation will cause a rapidly-spreading, merciless threat to the entire facility itself - a Rift Breach.

name: Turochamp
description:
Turochamp is a chess program developed by Alan Turing and David Champernowne in 1948. It was created as part of research by the pair into computer science and machine learning. Turochamp is capable of playing an entire chess game against a human player at a low level of play by calculating all potential moves and all potential player moves in response, as well as some further moves it deems considerable. It then assigns point values to each game state, and selects the move resulting in the highest point value.
Turochamp is the earliest known computer game to enter development, but was never completed by Turing and Champernowne, as its algorithm was too complex to be run by the early computers of the time such as the Automatic Computing Engine.

name: Chef Wanted
description: The chef at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza has gone missing, so Freddy has to give up the microphone and take control of the pizza-making for a whole week!

name: Tactical Command
description: Assemble armies of soldiers, lead them into battle, conquer your enemies and move one step closer to galactic domination!

name: Recall
description: An enthralling adventure told inside memories. Navigate through the recollections of a quirky cast of characters and mold their destiny.

name: Rescue Trivia
description:
Rescue Trivia is a blend of both puzzle and trivia game. Answer all the questions and rescue the guy ! . Use swipe mechanics to cut the rope and free the guy. His life depends on you so choose wise.
Good Luck

name: Swoords: Friends Word Game
description: SWOORDS is a free multiplayer word game, play in turn with your friends and challenge Doctor SWO.

name: What's the Logo?: Guess the Company Brand Word Game
description:
Think you know your clothing, car, tech and snack brands? Test your knowledge as you try to unscramble the letters of company logos displayed in the pic.
So you can identify Google, Nike and McDonalds by their symbols. So can all your friends. Compete with them head to head in the leaderboard by connecting to facebook. And if you're feeling stuck, fell free to reach out to them or your Twitter followers. And there's always those in-game powerups.

name: Bible Trivia Mania
description:
Do You Know God's Word? Test Yourself, And Grow!
Be challenged by witty and engaging questions. Complete quizzes in Missing Word, True or False and Multiple Choice modes. Take TESTS and EXAMS...as often as you want.

name: Crawl Quad
description:
Blocks originally placed on the field of fixed and marked point.
Each exhibited on the new unit has a direction of movement indicated by the arrow, and if it does not hold, then it starts to move in this direction as long as no other will face block or not go beyond the edge of the playing field.
If three or more blocks of the same color are connected together at the sides (not diagonally), then they are reduced.
Your task is remove all blocks from the board.

name: Race Control Director
description:
First time in gaming history you will be able to act as a race control director and guide races like never before.
Do you know what it feels like to control a race? Deploying yellow flags and penalise drivers? Take the chair of the race control director and guide your races to a safely and fair end for all drivers. Once you have mastered the skills of guiding a race, score as many points as you can and battle other players on the leaderboards.

name: Madden NFL 23 Mobile Football
description:
Kickoff for another season on the Gridiron with Madden NFL 23 Mobile Football. Authentic sports game action, real-world events and mobile-first visuals await in the world’s most immersive NFL Football experience on mobile.
Play Like Mad! Football superstar or armchair QB - touchdown and enjoy the celebrated sport with the same energy as iconic Coach John Madden. Madden 23 brings the highest-quality football experience with new, mobile enhancements and improved game visuals.
Build your Ultimate Team and dominate the competition. Earn football superstars from your favorite NFL teams, including the defending champion Los Angeles Rams! Keep your NFL Superstars from last Season with the soft-season reset.
Download the Madden NFL mobile app now to celebrate the game of Football and legacy of John Madden.

name: Cup Blitz 2
description:
Welcome to the Cup Blitz 2!
Become the World Champion in the safety of your home. Play the game! Rule the field. Bring the gold to your home. Make your team great again and your fans happy.
Play one of 115 nations in this fast paced arcade soccer game. Level up, upgrade your team, collect cards, become famous and write history with your name.
Unlock new game modes as you progress. Make your team stronger and stronger to challenge ultimate opponents and feel the shining glory of true Champion.

name: Top Gear: Race the Stig
description: The official BBC Top Gear Game!

name: Flick Cola
description:
Flick Cola,
The Simplest and The Most Beautiful game.
This is similar to Curling.
But it's more easier,
more speedy,
more beautiful,
and it's more intuitive.
You'll be able to enjoy the most thrilling sport just by throwing a coin.
Alone or with friends.

name: Stealth Hawk Flight Simulator
description:
Capture the world's wanted #1 terrorist !!!
Become a pilot of the Stealth Hawk helicopter and fly the famous scenario Code Name Geronimo.
Show your skill in the night rainy flights few feet above the ocean waves.
Or start from USS Nimitz carrier and explore beautiful tropical island with mountains, cities, rivers and lakes. Destroy any building and vehicle, land on military airbase to refuel or just try to return to USS Nimitz.
Beat your friends in GameCenter leaderboard!
Stealth Hawk is highly realistic flight simulator with real virtual cockpit, powerful mini-gun and many other details.

name: Vortexika
description:
Blast your way through the vortex of obstacles, asteroids and enemies in this relentless endless space shooter.
Pick up armor, ammo and V bucks to upgrade your ship and level your way up through 100 levels of intense space combat. Challenge your friends to get the highest score on the leaderboards.
From the creator of Only One

name: Parking Adventure HD
description: Park your car with fun and adventure!

name: Door Slammers
description:
Heat up your tires with long smokey burnouts and when the green light drops launch full throttle with your wheels in the air! Push your skills to the limit rapidly accelerating to over 200 mph all the while doing your best to keep from smoking the tires or blowing your engine on a tricky racing surface.
Pray your engine and chassis tuning are just right as you try to be the first to pilot across the finish line... but don't forget to pull the chute as you stand on the brakes before flying off the end of the track and into the sand traps!
Hone your reaction and ET as you strive for the perfect run in the bracket classes or drive on the edge of sanity in the heads up and grudge racing events.
Race online with your friends or around the world in live multiplayer action.
AMAZING 3D GRAPHICS
Smokey Burnouts, Header Flames, Nitrous Purges, Wheels Up Launches, Functional Parachute, Gear Shifting, Custom Paint, Hood Scoop, Wings and Wheelie Bars.

name: Abandoned: A Journey Home
description:
Abandoned, Alone, Scared and Lost!
This little critter needs your help to get Home!

name: Bouncing Buddies
description:
Now 100% free to play, no ads, no nothing. We hope it puts a smile on your face in these tough times – stay safe!
Guide your animal buddy as they jump through an obstacle course of platforms by moving your thumb from side to side. Maintaining the rhythm is simple, but this casual arcade game is tough to master as the music speeds up!
Land your happy furry inflatable friends accurately on the platforms for higher scores and more rewards!

name: Rox Fling
description:
'Rox Fling' is the ultimate physics based 'fling em up.' Rag-doll your way to victory and beat your friends!
Help Rox, hapless hero, recover all the stolen presents from the mischievous dinosaurs. Throw yourself across the tundra and bounce off dinosaurs in your wake!

name: Infinite Canyon
description:
Test your skills and reflexes flying impressively fast planes in procedurally generated infinite canyons !
Earn your wings with 3 increasingly fast planes and see how much score you can make with each of them.
Fly low, fast, near obstacles and mostly survive the longer that you can to increase your score.
Both accelerometer and touch controls are implemented to adapt the flight experience to you.
Will you be able to keep mach speed at 15 ft from ground ?
Ready for the next step ? Achievements and scoreboard will spice up the challenge.

name: Foolball
description: Foolball is a medieval sports game where two gladiators battle until the king is pleased. Those two gladiators battle by playing a game where the fool is a ball and burning loops are the goals.

name: Mega Snake: highly addictive
description: Sin descripción

name: Memorrha Mobile
description:
Go on a voyage of discovery following the traces of a mysterious culture.
Solve the mystery of sleeping machines and learn more about their creators. A diverse and open world full of thrilling puzzles and secrets awaits you.

name: Snake Switch
description:
This is not just a same color match arcade game. You have choices to select one colorful star and switch one colorful block bar. It is a bit like a puzzle. But you don't have to much time to consider. You must make a decision at once.
There are four colors stars and four or five or more bars. One color star can switch all same color bar before it. Then control your snake to cross the gap. In every block, the first color star will get 1 score, the second color star will get 2 scores, the third color star will get 3 scores, the fourth star will get 4 scores. So, are you a greedy snake who will eat all stars to get max scores? Or, are you a surviving snake who will eat the necessary colors stars only?
Default snake has a white arrow head and a rainbow body. There are other snakes you can unlock with the stars you collect in game.You can see them in the button with a arrow.There are some colors, styles, arrows, and more will come soon.
It is endless. Play it as arcade game or puzzle game, or both.

name: Polygon Evolution
description: Polygon Evolution is a difficult, abstract, combative, puzzle game in which you place cells and try to combine them to stave off an opponent whose only goals are to spread and evolve. It’s an other-worldly experience of sounds, shapes and colours mixed with a challenging reinterpretation of match-3 game mechanics.

name: Run on the Beat
description: Let's overcome with music! Jump to the beat and earn coins!

name: Neon
description:
How many levels will you beat?
Can you collect all the characters? All original music from McFarland Beats!

name: No One Dies 2: Hybrid Movement
description: No One Dies 2: Hybrid Movement is a Real-Time Online, Multiplayer With Global player!

name: Copter Blocks
description: Sin descripción

name: PizzaStore
description: Alex wants to become the godfather of the pizza industry. Alex's begins serving to pizza at the pizza store in the country. Alex must earn your trust for naughty Tom and wacky cook. Please help Alex to collect various items.

name: Pinch Peeps
description: Pinch Peeps is a unique experience designed exclusively for the Apple iOS devices. Enjoy an endless gameplay experience with a variety of game modes and compete in online leaderboards in this frantically fun mobile game.

name: Locole
description:
Let's connect railroads and lead the train to the terminal station!
Many passengers are waiting for your train in the way station.
Please do not leave them. It's important to carry them all to get a high-score!

name: Ninja Chicken Basic
description: Save the Ninja Chickens from the jaws of doom! With your godly finger, attempt to swoop them to the safety of their correct ninja zones while avoiding the Robot Chickens and getting rid of the evil pigs. Are you Ninja Chicken enough to help?

name: Kids Love Puzzles
description:
Kids Love Puzzles
Beautiful puzzle game for kids. If your children love wooden shape puzzle this is perfect game for them.
Over thirty boards with progressing difficulty gives a lot of fun.

name: Gestures on iOS
description: Just use the gestures, your iPhone/iPad or iPod touch offers you, to play this funny game. Are you fast enough to follow the rhythm? And watch out, some times you also have to think what you are doing :-)

name: Animal Roadkill Road Racing 2 - Extreme Mutant Trip Games
description:
You've stumbled into the ROAD and now you're in big trouble!
As one of three crazy critters weave and dodge the traffic to survive.
How far will you get without going SPLAT!?

name: Bop A Dork
description: Bop A Dork is a fast paced Arcade style game packed with unique artwork and sounds where your goal is to bop as many dorks as you can. Track your dork bopping stats on the statistics page and see if you can unlock all of the awards!

name: CapsuleToy
description:
CapsuleToy is a toy capsule (also known as gashapon, gasha, gacha) collection game. You collect many many sweet toys from the toy capsule machine, and organizing them in your little room, take a photo and share with friends.
Have you ever tried empty out a toy capsule machine and get all the fancy prizes in it? In CapsuleToy you can do it!
There are 4 sets of toys in the machine, make your choice and drop the coin into the machine, you will be surprised by what you get! You can also sell the toys you don't like to retain some money.

name: Make A Scene: Farmyard
description:
Make a Scene Farmyard is a fun interactive game that engages children’s natural sense of creativity. It is aimed primarily at pre-school age children, but will provide hours of entertainment for children (and adults!) of all ages. Helping to develop vocabulary, fine motor skills, co-ordination and creative thinking, Make a Scene offers a great way for children to play and learn at the same time.
Make a Scene Farmyard uses drag and drop interactions, descriptive audio, fun sound effects and engaging animations to create an entertaining, educational platform. Children will have endless fun using their imagination to create their very own farmyard scenes.

name: Tiny Brush
description:
The pretty brushes compete by painting each other and performing the little battles shooting the paintballs. And they attack each other moving busily to snatch the flags.
Anybody can enjoy “Tiny Brush” easily any time and show up the characters of his or her own to the people by growing up and decorating them with the unique costumes through the level up.
You can have a match against all users worldwide through the game center.
Be the world best among the users of “Tiny Brush” around the world with the variety of items.

name: Duckers
description:
Join Duckers and friends on a wild treasure hunt in this fantastic mining adventure.
Dig for gold coins and gems, and collect all the secret items to complete your collection.
With its adorable cast of characters, different areas to unlock, and numerous upgrades, Duckers is endless fun for the whole family.
Earn Game Center achievements as you complete your collection of secret goodies, or compete for the best score with your friends on the leaderboard.
How deep can you go? What dangers and treasures are waiting for Duckers and his friends? Don't wait any longer, download Duckers now and get digging.

name: Maze 100
description: Help your animal friends get through the maze. With 100 mazes ranging from small to massive, you'll be busy for hours. Try to beat the clock to get the most stars. Use the hint button if you get lost or the make random button for a new maze. Have fun playing Maze 100.

name: Ducky Dive
description:
New updated version with wide screen interface, faster game pace with more challenging game play and clearer water color.
A simple game, combining realistic buoyancy simulation with intriguing graphic art. The simple game play will provide small excitement that perfectly suitable for in-between activities time waster.
Help the duck to dive and catch the fish, while keep watching the air and power level. Running out of the air will accelerate the power level decrement. When the power level is zero, the game is over. Several floating woods and barrel, all with realistic floating movement, will become the obstacles for the duck to maneuver. The other challenge is the piranhas. Designed with simple AI (Artificial Intelligence), the Piranhas will swim after the duck whenever they meet the duck. The new updated version also include the underwater tunnels as one of the obstacles.
Virtuaego is an indie developer in Jakarta, Indonesia. Ducky Dive is Virtuaego’s first game/ applications for iOS.

name: Doodle Smash!
description:
Faster! Full of Glubies invaded your screen! They are everywhere!
Smash and crush these little creatures as quick as possible!
If they become too big, they will explode... And you will lose one life at each explosion. After three lifes, Game Over! So be fast!
Be careful to the bombs. Some monsters are tougher than others and will be need more smashing or in several crushes.
This very funny game is simple and addictive.
Play with your family or your friends and share your scores to see who is the best and the quickest.
You will love smashing these Glubies!

name: Toon Skate: True Freedom Racing
description: Grab your board and head for the hills! Experience the fun of skating to town in this fun filled rush of a game! Watch out for obstacles, jump and tilt your way to the top!

name: Norigiri
description:
Catch the ingredient on the rice ball! Make the best rice ball in the world! Swipe the rice ball horizontally to catch the falling ingredients! Reach 3000 yen to be a good rice ball.
Catching expensive ingredients and hear the sound of joy!

name: Pop Gems
description:
Begin to join in the fun! Pop Gems is a dazzling puzzle game with strategy.
The greedy dwarf loves gems and brings a huge bag to collect gems in forest. Come among with relaxing music, help the dwarf to collect more gems as you can!

name: Turtle Fly: Into Space
description:
As the first flying turtle, you must use your cola-powered jet-boosters to fly your way to the moon!
If you ever want to make it to outer space, you will need to upgrade everything from your main engine and boosters, to your hat and air resistance. Collect more valuable diamonds as you fly higher, and use them to purchase as many upgrades as you can afford.
Earn achievements as you reach faster speeds, higher heights, and earn more money. Eventually, you will leave behind your cola-powered jet-boosters in exchange for solar energy, and who knows after that.

name: Roboto
description: In Roboto you take full control of the character to navigate crazy platform jumps and shoot off of skatepark ramps. Silky smooth thumbstick and button controls. 2 ways to play - choose either Joystick or L/R buttons.

name: Slots Ancient
description:
Enjoy the thrill of winning Pharaoh's mystic and countless treasures! Have fun with this unique tumbling reel slots instantly just like in Vegas! Download and play for FREE! Best casino slots machine games!
Slots Ancient bring you the secrets and treasure from the mystery ancient Pharaoh! Enjoy the endless fun from this amazing slot machine! You will love it if you like this slots game, like any other casino games. You can also compete for the great jackpot with players all over the world!

name: Amazing Love: Cupid's Arrows
description:
Amazing Love is a romantic and addictive game. You can not miss it.
Hold Cupid's Bow and shoot arrows to let love fall and fill love's bottle.
Your get three lives at the beginning, lose one life if your arrow misses or hit at ghost and earn one life if your arrow hit at doctor. You lose all your lives for hit at satan!

name: Quizarium
description:
Are you too brainy to keep it to yourself? Then try the new Quizarium app to pit your wits against other smarties like yourself. Select a category, answer fast, and participate in numerous tournaments.
In Quizarium you have one minute to answer the question. And so do any of your competitors. Every 12 seconds you get a hint: the number of letters in the puzzle, 1st letter, 2nd letter… Well, we’re sure you’ll get it right much faster! Various questions to challenge your intellect are wrapped in juicy graphics. And rest assured, it’s not just good old Geography and Biology questions in there. The other way round, you’ll find plenty of LOL questions in this app that will still challenge your mind.

name: Photo Quiz: 4 pics, 1 thing in common - what’s the word?
description:
Get ready for the new fun and challenging quiz game!
In Photo Quiz you will see four different images. Your task is to find out what those four images have in common. In other words - four clues but only one right answer!

name: Feevo HD
description:
Jewel games meet their perfect match with Feevo HD!
Whether you want to play at your own pace with the gem matching Fever mode or crush your high scores in the blitz-fast Blaze mode, Feevo HD offers something for puzzle lovers of all ages. Download it for free today!

name: Extreme Karts
description: Great reaction times separate the winners from the losers in kart racing. Champion kart racers think and act faster than the competition. With Extreme Karts, the ultimate racing game, you can test your driving skills to the max. Start your kart and dodge oncoming karts as you shift to higher and higher gears! Great reaction times let you keep driving longer and faster. Extreme Karts scores your driving as the seconds and minutes you can stay on the track.

name: My Hero: Tiny Ninja
description: In this game the stick hero is always walking towards the edge of the cliff while holding the stick as it is being extended. Once the stick is released it will drop to the ground and fall to the other side. If you drop it on top of the previous fallen stick it will slide to the end of that stick then fall. To make things more interesting the sweet spot on the other side is a chicken walking back and forth. Hit the chicken with the end of the stick and you get an additional 2 points plus 1 chicken will be deposited into your account, use those chickens to barter for special characters like Hansen the mischievous boy ninja, black kitty who is simply naughty and does not take losing lightly and the soft hearted panda who cries at the drop of a hat. Before you barter for one of these 3 special characters take them out for a free spin.

name: Crossnumber: Math Puzzle Game
description: Crossnumber: Math Puzzle Game is similar to Word Search, but you need to search or find the number instead of a word. If you can't find the number. You need to combine or solve it using the scramble numbers and mathematical symbols.

name: MahJah
description:
Mahjong-solitaire like matching 3D time killer game.
Find matching cubes. Faster you find matches - more scores you earn.

name: Super Citycon: City Builder
description:
Huge and unlimited maps, short construction times and a simulation style economy! 
From Gamers for Gamers: A city building game you will enjoy! 
Build your very own City on beautiful and huge maps. Unlock over 150 Buildings of multiple categories, some of them with multiple variations.
Start with a farm, build your residential neighborhoods, commercial and industrial areas, care about water, food, energy, and waste management.
Take care of your resident's security with police and fire stations, be sure they stay healthy with medical center’s and hospitals.
Make your City a great place to live with parks, sports, and recreation areas!

name: MilliBilli Slots
description: A tap on your mobile or tablet takes you right into the colorful floors of Vegas. Enjoy the revolutionary, variable dual screen in veritcal style! Active action screen adds a whole lot of fun. Dynamic, vivid sound and amusing game themes are a real treat!

name: Warsino
description:
On a planet somewhere in the galaxy. An evil arms dealing dictator is running the first ever War Casino... Warsino. The players are a deprived population who are subjugated to slave labor building his weapons of mass destruction. Their only escape is to win the game or lose it all.
Welcome to Warsino. Using the helicopter you control, the objective of the game is defend your base from incoming tanks. You will need to build towers to defend against your enemies. In order to get more towers you will need to play the base slot machine.
We would appreciate any feedback you may have.

name: Space Walk: Memory Games for Adults
description: Space Walk is a terrific logic game. The board consists of circles with digits. The digits mean a number of fields that can be passed. The aim of the game is to create a way to the exit by properly placing circles on the board. Click on a circle to highlight it. In order to spread the contents consistent with the digit it bears, click on the field next to it. You may spread the circles in all directions.

name: Dices Toss: The Falling Eight Count
description:
Dices Toss will test your reflexes the hard way, despite its simple design.
Your ultimate impossible goal is to keep tapping on falling dices to score more points.
Sounds simple? It's not!

name: Conquer: Epic of Dice Wars
description: Conquer – Epic of Dice Wars is the best world domination strategy game inspired by the classic online Dice Wars game. Now on your iPad or iPhone, you can play against up to 5 relentlessly smart AI robots or real gamers to overtake their territories and dominate the world.

name: European Soccer Cup 2016 Slot
description:
Choose your bet from 1 to 15 Paylines and GG Coins and spin the reels.
When the 3 or more Cup poststamp symbols appear you will access the Bonus games.

name: Toast the Chicken: Hard Puzzle Game Unique Brain Teaser
description: Toast The Chicken is an unique and challenging puzzle game where you have to toast all the chickens with fire. But beware not to hurt yourself or you'r fellow scientists!

name: Mathable
description: The critically acclaimed game of logic, strategy and math skills is finally available on the iPhone and iPad. Mathable challenges players to use simple math equations to score points using the numbers given to them throughout the game. A great way to spend time with family and friends!

name: Ghosty Party
description:
Vaporize as many ghosts of the same color as you can to get a high score, with cute halloween theme animations, bonuses, and sound effects.
The more ghosts you tap at once, the more scores you will get. The more same color ghosts combo, the more scores multiply.

name: Grip on Reality
description: Follow adventures of a crazy wizard casting spells. The spells tend to be quite chaotic and unpredictable. The wizard finds himself embarking on a long quest across the world to uncover the mysterious cult worshipping a crystal, the same crystal powering the wizards staff.

name: Panspermia: Horror Myson Mansion
description: After the disappearance of his sister Maria, Marcelo decides to start his search on his own since the police cancel the search for her, Marcelo goes alone to the Myson mansion, which was the last place she visited. A bizarre mystery awaits you at the Myson mansion.

name: The Mystic Well
description: The Mystic Well is a Dungeon Master like RPG. A powerful wizard once enchanted his life force into a golden skull and then proclaimed himself to be a God. After his ascent to Godhood, he conquered the citadel known as Mystic Mirror to show his power. The player must now foil the evil wizard's plan on world destruction.

name: Rhythm Control 2
description: Rhythm Control 2 is now free to play and supported by in game ads. Purchase any song pack to remove all the ads. Rhythm Control 2 is finally here with improved gameplay features, a shiny new interface and a surplus of new tracks to play!

name: Mr. Ball
description: Mr. Ball encounters big trouble on his way home. The wicked witch has laid many obstacles with her sorceries. Can Mr. Ball avoid all obstacles and get home safely? His destiny lies in your hand! You may set Mr. Ball flying with simply a slice on the screen, avoid all the monsters and traps, you will guide Mr. Ball home! Take this fun challenge with your fingertips, show off your dexterity! Break a leg on this fun mini game!

name: Pocket Bomberman Blast Heroes
description: Collect power ups to get more powerful bombs! Use the explosive bombs to blast your enemies from across the map! And don't worry if you get blasted, then the fun has just begun!

name: Voice Party
description:
Party games on a whole new level! Transform any ordinary get-together into a super-fun party with 4 amazing games guaranteed to get people laughing! Includes Secnetnes, Noise Master, Sillyrics, and Story Bomb.

Record a sentence and play it back in reverse. Now everyone tries to say that sentence in reverse, and Voice Party records each attempt. Voice Party will play back everyone’s attempts in reverse to see who came closest to saying the original sentence. Get ready for pure nonsense!

Charades with a twist! Without speaking, use sounds and gestures to demonstrate the target word. For an even bigger challenge, you are only allowed to make sounds. How good are you at imitating the cry of an eagle?

Sing the totally random phrases that Voice Party matches to well-known songs. Create and record your nonsensical karaoke musical masterpiece! Just because the lyrics are absurd doesn’t mean you can’t sing your heart out.

Record individual sounds and use them to string together fun stories with your friends. Will you weave a story that actually makes sense? It doesn’t matter!
Connect with friends and see who can rise to the top of the leaderboard as the most skilled party-gamer! Grab some drinks, open a bag of chips and get ready to have a blast: it's time for Voice Party!

name: First Letter
description: Can you find the first letter in the scrambled word? That's the basic idea of FirstLetter.

name: Cyberlaser
description: CyberLaser is an augmented reality-based puzzle game that uses your real-life environment to enroll you in exciting puzzle challenges. The goal is to guide lasers to the energy crystals using mirrors, portals, and explosions.

name: A Valentine's Day Quizzle
description: Did you know that Cupid has a brother? Or the telephone was patented on Valentine's Day?

name: A Year of Riddles
description:
A Year of Riddles gives you hundreds of classic riddles to solve.
This game has one riddle for each day of the year. All of them are accessible right away, for you to play at your own rhythm.
Write the solution from the 15 letters available. As soon as the correct solution is entered, the riddle is solved.

name: Doodle Movie Quiz
description: Try to guess what movie is being depicted in each doodle! In the Normal game mode you can take as much time as you want and go through every doodle available. In One Minute mode, you have exactly 60 seconds to get as many doodles correct as possible! In 3 Strikes mode, you can only get 3 doodles wrong before you lose!

name: Guess the Movie Game
description: Watch 10 seconds video and guess the movie!

name: Clandestine: Anomaly
description: You receive a mayday hail from an alien vessel that’s on a collision course with your real-world neighborhood. If you don’t act fast, the situation will become catastrophic. Not just for them, but for you and your entire neighborhood.

name: Tiler More
description: Tiler More is a very fun word building game that you will love. Make words by stacking letters and merging them together. Get all the words to win!

name: Lines Lines
description:
LinesLines is the most gorgeous smooth brain training classic match puzzle game. Easy to get start but hard to get a high score. In addition to six colored pieces, three props pieces make the game more interesting.
Make five pieces of the same color in a line to remove them from board. New pieces will appear if no piece removing after each piece moving.

name: Pirate Pop Mega Quiz
description: Join Captain Gunpowder Jack as he explores the treacherous yet colorful world of Pirate Pop Mega Quiz! Journey across treasure maps as you answer your way through the numerous levels, help uncover the lost treasures and defeat the evil Captain Liver-bottom.

name: Wind-Up Maze HD
description: Wind-Up Maze HD is a different kind of maze game. The object of the game is to get the mouse to the end of the maze while collecting as much cheese as you can. What makes Wind-Up Maze HD different is the fact that the mouse guides itself through the maze. Your job is to customize the maze in order to create a path for the mouse to successfully reach the end.

name: Stupid Dog Find Out HD
description:
This one, looking at the game, don’t look away, i’m talking you,
Ok, today, playing this game will make your life changed a lot!
Don’t just stop at the sight,
It is actually a priceless treasure that can change the world and stimulate the pet business, it now has charmed thousands of girls and boys.

name: Light'em Up: For brainiacs only
description:
Light'em up is a simple, beautiful, easy to play puzzle, yet challenging, and difficult to master.
Tap on the blocks to rotate them, creating a path for the power to flow through the bulbs and lighting them up!

name: Block by Block: Sliding Blocks
description:
During the game you forget about time.
If you enjoy the kind of games with lots of jewels, gems or bubbles you will definitely love Block by Block.
Sense of this game is to remove all blocks from the board.
To do this, click on the blocks with an arrow outside the playing field. The block will begin to move in the indicated direction.
If three or more of the same color blocks form a group, they will disappear.
When the playing field will be cleared of the blocks, level will be passed.
A good game to relax and unwind.

name: Democracy: The Board Game
description: Democracy is a new game that family and friends can enjoy together. An alternative to Monopoly, its simple and fun to play while at the same time promoting a fairer, cleaner, healthier world for everyone. The game has one goal...Defeat the Dictator!

name: Ice Dig
description:
Play on your Apple Watch, iPhone and iPad!
Ice Dig is an addictive board game that you can play by yourself or online with others.
You and your opponent dig the ice brick in turns, your mission is to dig the ice as much as possible but keep the penguin on top. The one who falls the penguin loses the game.
Ice brick in different color has different weight and value, now get your gears and defeat your opponent!

name: Mahjong Wonders
description:
Challenge your puzzle skills with over 3000 brain-teasing levels of classic Mahjong.
Embark on an epic Mahjong quest across 60 ancient civilizations that will put Your tile matching skills to the test.
Discover exciting ancient artefacts and treasures along the way!

name: Chop Chop Kicker
description:
Kicking cute dinosaurs and making them fly used to be the national sport of the paleolithic age!
Now, you can re-live the very first flights of the dinosaurs! The magic ink will allow you to draw lines and control the little buddy during his flight.
Use bouncy mushrooms, fat and angry birds, clouds and much, much more to improve your flying distance.
But be careful, the world is hostile and many dangers and obstacles will slow you

name: Block Puzzle: Gem Legend
description: Block Puzzle: Gem Legend is one of the tetra puzzle games, but it's harder. With the given block, you can arrange it anywhere into the grid. However, you will see 3 blocks in the same time and think to build much full lines as possible. Because the more blocks are shattered the more the score higher.

name: Fairy Magic Skillz Tournaments
description:
Remove two or more cubes of the same color. Earn the highest score before time runs out.
Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!
From the creators of Fairy Mahjong comes the online multiplayer puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

name: Sevn
description:
Throughout history and among many different cultures and religions, the number 7 is believed to be more than just a number.
In this mystical turn based game we honour this extraordinary number.
7 colors. 7 towers each color. Take turn picking towers.
Get all seven towers of one color or get most out of seven colors to win.

name: Flower Garden: Connect Mania
description:
Lose yourself in a beautiful garden, full of colorful buds.
Connect the same buds to make them bloom. Fill the board to finish the level.
Solve addictive puzzles and transform your garden into a piece of art!

name: Iceberg the Game
description:
Iceberg is based on Heads Up! the fun and hilarious game by Ellen Degeneres that she plays on her show, and you can play this new version with friends!
From learning stories about the person you're on a date with or breaking the ice with new friends to getting to know your close friends even better - Iceberg is the game to play.
Play with at least one other person and go through the decks, each taking a turn to answer the questions - it's also a great way to break the ice with groups or at a bar.

name: Face Word
description:
Welcome (back) to face control! From the (mostly sane) authors of the (not particularly sane) Face Candy comes Face Word!
Face Word uses the unique Face Mapping feature of ARKit to let you control the game with your face!
Hook the letter candies with your nose and stick your tongue out to slurp them in!
Spell out words to gain points and more time.
Play three different game modes, Normal, Relaxed and Freestyle.
Collect points to unlock new face features, customise your look and unlock a bonus game mode!

name: Letter Club
description:
Letter Club is the fastest word game on planet!! Making words has never been this exciting!
Challenge your friends or climb the ranked ladder to become the greatest wordsmith the world has ever known. Can you do it? Make as many words as you can to beat your opponent. Be quick though, you have just 60 seconds! Then take your rewards and build your collection by upgrading your letters. Watch as your letters grow stronger and stronger. Unleash their ultimate power .. by making the longest word you can find on the board :P

name: Word Invaders!
description:
Make words before the invaders destroy your tiles. Think quick to unlock special tiles and bonuses, challenge nasty bosses and test your vocabulary in this challenging and addictive arcade word game.
If you’re a fan of Words with Friends or Scrabble you’re going to love word invaders. The scoring is surprisingly familiar but the game play is from another planet. It’s a frenzied word-lovers delight with 30 levels of dictionary busting fun.

name: Word Vs Picture
description:
Play and guess hundreds of words!
New puzzle - crossword with picture.
Play and guess hundreds of words!
New puzzle - crossword with picture.
The game - for real geniuses, check your vocabulary.
If you like crosswords, puzzles, the gallows, the word with words, riddles and other games of this genre - then the "Word / picture" is what you need!
At each level, make come true 4 words, each shown in the picture. As in any crossword they intersect, guess one word - opens a one letter the next, and so on!

name: Memory Match IQ Brain Training
description:
Today we all know about the benefits of everyday exercises and good food. We got used to go to gym, watch out for what we eat, but very few know that the informational fast food is that bad for us as fast food for our health. Although our brain doesn’t look like a muscle it needs everyday trainings and ignoring this fact makes your brain work less qualitatively. This will lead Its gradual extinction, to the "senile dementia" or Alzheimer's disease.
So is it possible to prevent this process? Sure! The Brain fitness App includes intellectual push-ups that will help you not only to stay in shape but also improve your brain activity. All exercises are made in game form, you can train any time anywhere: on your way to work or uni, while you stand in a queue, on your sofa or even sitting in a toilet :)
Regular trainings for a few minutes will give you lots of benefits! Just in few weeks you will educate more effective, easily remember new names and numbers, find ways out of difficult situations, easily concentrate, ignore distracting situations, think different, open new talents!

name: Alpha Zen
description: Alpha Zen is a puzzle game with something to say. In this companion to the critically acclaimed Color Zen, you connect words to build quotes, from literature, pop culture, and philosophy to your own friends' Facebook statuses. As in Color Zen, there are no points or penalties for failure - only you, your headphones, and the collected wisdom of the world.

name: Word-O-Mania
description:
A fast-paced global multiplayer game where you need to fight your way up to the top of the leaderboard trying to guess as many words as you can in a limited period of time.
Enjoy hours of fun gameplay and improve your word-finding and vocabulary skill!

name: An Endless Runner and a Word Game Had a Baby...
description:
Make words (3 letters or more) to create platforms so the runner guy can get to the other side! Make the words fast enough or he'll fall to his doom!
Some Quick Playing Tips

name: Icontrivia: Guess the Celebrity
description:
From glamorous Hollywood A-Listers to legendary music stars and controversial reality stars to highflying sports personnel, it’s time to guess all your favorite celebrities.
Test your knowledge about these famous celebrities from cinema, music, TV, sports and politics in this highly addictive word guessing game.
Hints & Help: Struggling to guess a celebrity? You can reveal or remove letters to help you figure out the character.
Ask your Friends: Stuck on a puzzle? Share it on Facebook or Twitter and ask for help from your friends and followers.
Play with Friends: Compete with your Facebook friends to see who can guess the most number of celebrities.

name: Baby Blocks: Swipe & Tap Letters, Spell Words Fast
description: Experience the child like delight of 4 letter word matching and play Baby Blocks today! Tap or swipe letters, form words and advance through 100 exciting levels and 3 challenging skill levels. Learn new words every day with the word of the day feature. Create huge scores with multipliers like speed and color bonus. Use powerful boosters like freeze time to aide you in your word matching endeavors. It’s time to swap those blocks. Baby Blocks, it’s wordilicious!

name: Brain Box Quiz: Trivia Fun
description:
Brain Box Quiz: Trivia Fun is a fun comedy quiz game, starring the eponymous joke and pun cracking host.
You'll answer questions in seven trivia categories, testing your knowledge on entertainment, music, sport, general knowledge, history, geography and literature.
Quiz questions on Trivia Fun are full of jokes and laughs, and there's 100s to play! There's loads of questions about your most-loved movies, TV shows, music acts and sport stars.
You'll be laughing along to the (hopefully) funny jokes, and learning lots of new facts to bore... er... entertain your friends with.
You can play Trivia Fun against a Timer, or quiz in Zen mode for the times when you just want to chill out.
Do you want a hint about what I'm going to mention next? Yes, it's hints! Stumped by a trivia question? I suggest you take a hint and remove two of the possible quiz answers to make it a 50/50 chance - and those are great odds!
Want a fun character to use as your avatar? Who wouldn't?!? There's some fantastic characters to reflect the beautiful person, or werewolf, you are!
Here's the bullet points!
